033.content:
Riley was so glad it was Saturday.

The party last night had gone great. Several close friends had come over, and a few people she didn't know as well. She trusted the friends who invited them though, so soon enough, the party was in full swing, and she was having a ball.

The alcohol began to flow. She might not have been old enough to drink, but the party-goers learned quickly that Riley could hold her liquor with the best of them. No questions asked, she was the life of the party. With her sisters not invited, she had locked her crystal in her jewelry box to avoid it getting lost, which was more than could be said about her inhibitions that night--they were lost to the wind until the morning.

And what a morning it was. Her hangover hadn't been terrible, and she didn't wake up with a strange person in bed with her. All in all, she just had some cleaning to do, but they could wait until breakfast. Glancing around the bedroom in her on-campus apartment, she sighed gently and rolled out of bed. She wasn't entirely sure who was still here, but her bedroom was off limits, and everyone knew that. Seeing nothing in disarray, she was happy to see her friends had respected that one rule.

Slipping over to her closet, she grabbed tank-top and shorts, lazy pajamas for a lazy morning. Finally, she pulled on her fluffy slippers and headed for the kitchen. Breakfast was simple, buttered toast and jam, fresh fruit, and some hot tea, and a big glass of water to wash down the pain killers for her headache. All were finished quickly, and Riley made her way back to the bedroom, grabbed fresh clothes, and headed to the bathroom to shower. She washed clean, brushed her hair and teeth, then made her way back out to begin cleaning her apartment. It would take an hour or two, but once she was done, she'd have all of Saturday to relax. She was glad everyone headed out early.

***
Daniel 'Dweeberson' Dwebson was a nice guy. He got straight A's, was a model student, and held a steady-part time job. Despite all of this, he was always going to be 'Dweeberson' to his classmates. He hated the name, but there was little he could do about it. He was, however, 21, and able to get alcohol for parties. He was invited by one of the other students to provide the booze, and bringing the alcohol would skyrocket him out of his nerdiness, and definitely land him squarely within range of Riley Lancaster's affection. He wanted that more than he wanted anything life could have offered.

So when he arrived on time, dropped off the booze, then was invited by his new friends to see Riley in her bedroom, he quickly obliged. Instead of Riley waiting for him there, he was sorely disappointed to find a a couple kids with a blindfold, a gag, and a a very long rope. Moments later, Daniel was shoved into Riley's closet, where he spent the rest of the night, trapped among her clothes, shoes, and personal items. He felt so used, so betrayed, so embarrassed. Had Riley been complicit in this? Did she plan it the whole time? Did she even know he was there? The thoughts plagued his head, so much so that at one point he felt faint, and swore that the world around him was getting bigger. Trying to ignore the situation, he closed his eyes and fell asleep, unaware of how tiny he was becoming.

***
The real party was in Riley's kitchen. It wasn't large, just enough to fit some appliances and have a couple people roaming in and out. However, the alcohol was being kept there. After Dweeberson had arrived with the booze, Alex, Nikki, Sarah, Chris and Kyle had become the guard dogs. If you wanted alcohol, you were subject to their judgement first. Anyone but Riley had to prove themselves to the tribunal before receiving their precious drinks. It was all in fun.

The pranks, shenanigans and near debauchery that people were forced to go through to acquire a drink had reached ridiculous levels. Riley had even begun recording the events, but was quickly discouraged, these people had reputations to keep up with after all. Fortunately, no one would remember any of this the next morning, there was far too much alcohol being tossed around, despite what the co-eds and their boy-toys allowed. Around 3 am, people were so intoxicated that they were lounging wherever they could, sleeping on the floors, sitting on counters, leaned against appliances. Riley stumbled through at one point, laughing at her friends drunken stupor. None of them even realized there her intoxication had loosed her concentration on her powers, and the students in the kitchen all began to diminish rapidly, just as Riley made her way out of the kitchen, and tumbled into her bed, never to emerge again before morning.

***

At one point, the near-debauchery that had taken place in the kitchen had become too difficult for young couple Josh and Christina, and they slipped into the bathroom, locking the door behind them. They locked the door, turned out the lights, and things got hot and heavy rather quickly. Christina, shorter than her boyfriend, had taken a seat on the counter by the sink, and disregarded Riley's toothbrush, hairbrush, makeup kit, and other various items still strewn about the counter. Some of them she moved out of the way, other she just sat on, too focused on her boyfriend too care. Josh stood in front of her, and the near-debauchery moved into full-blown debauchery.

Riley made her way towards her room after she dismissed the hijinks in the kitchen, unaware that her powers were causing everyone she walked by to shrink to a tiny size. Pausing by her bathroom, she tried to open the door.

"Occupied!" She recognized Josh's voice, and rolled her eyes.
"Guys..c'mon..."
"Occ-u-pied!" He repeated again, trying to hush his girlfriend's giggles. Riley slammed her fist into the door, and decided she was more tired than she needed to pee. As though her anger projected her powers, Josh quickly found himself shrinking down to the floor, somewhere within the bathroom rug, while Christina was lost on the counter, surrounded by Riley's now massive hygiene products.

"See ya, Pen" Heather said. Then in one quick motion, Heather slapped Penny's ass, cupping her friend's rear. "Take good care of Tina."

Penny smirked and clenched her cheeks in response. The slight resistance between her cheeks only made her laugh. "Trust me, she's going to wish she kept it in her pants now that she's in mine."

Tina squirmed and fought inside the canyon-sized crack as Penny walked. Every movement began to grind Tina between the meaty walls of flesh. She wanted to scream, but she feared of getting a breath full of rank air.

Penny sat down on her favorite desk, which in turn spelled disaster for the shrunken girl. The pressure went right back to unbearable. Tina felt as if she was going to pop as the pressure between Penny's glutes was beyond painful. She felt her muscles begin to strain against the weight.

As the class went on, Penny's mind drifted to her brand new cushion. She really wanted to torture the little slut. Well, more than she already was. No matter how many times, she rubbed her ass against the seat, it never felt like she was doing enough to Tina. With each passing minute, Penny devised a new way to punish Tina. It wasn't until the eighth or so fantasy of disposing Tina that the bell rang. As most of the students filed out of class, Penny stayed behind, choosing to sit on Tina just a little longer.

Afterwards...
0411.title: Penny's New Butt Buddy

choices: Penny confronts her cheating ex about Tina
Penny plays with Tina by herself
04112.content:
Penny headed to gym class with her sports bag and tiny Tina in tow. Penny was used to shrinking people for gym, they helped soak up her sweat. She had never put someone in the back of her underwear before.

“This is should be fun.” she said as she changed into her basketball shorts. She jiggled her ass for good measure.

“Alright ladies listen up! First team to three wins. I don’t want to see any foul play here. Now play ball!”

Penny took the ball and landed her first shot within seconds. That was the thing about her, even if she was a force to be reckoned with off the court didn’t mean she’d stop dominating while she was on it. She could bob and weave like nobody’s business. If she wanted to, she could play professionally. She’s certainly used her powers to grow an inch or two, why not a whole foot? Penny figured that if she made herself six to seven feet tall, but could still win at half her height then she couldn’t see a reason in the world why her sister would make her give up her love for the sport. She wasn’t hurting anybody, if they wanted to win then should’ve practiced more like her. While Penny was having fun her butt plug certainly was not. The smell, the sweat, it was overpowering. But that still didn’t compare to the pain that she was forced to endure from Penny’s movements. Her thunderous butt cheeks would clap on her repeatedly, each time feeling like she was getting sandwiched in between a pair of mountains. She should’ve had her bones crushed entirely, but unfortunately for her the crystal’s magic prevented that. She wanted to die.

“Alright everyone good game! Now clean up and hit the showers.”

Penny grabbed a towel and walked into the locker room. She was drenched in sweat, which she saw as a good sign both because it meant that she worked hard during that game and because it meant that Tina should be nearing the end of her suffering. But Penny wasn’t quite ready for it to end so she just started grinding back and forth, dragging out the pleasure of crushing someone as long as she could. All of a sudden she overheard a conversation a group of girls were having.

“I can’t believe the school let a man in the girls locker room.” One of them said exasperatedly.

“Yeah I know. Doesn’t he know that this place doesn’t belong to him.” another replied.

“I swear if this school doesn’t do something about the freaks here I’m going to have my dad sue.” said a third girl, gritting her teeth.

Penny lifted the towel off her face and took a second to look around. She saw a group of three blondes and off in the corner by herself, was a girl hugging her legs to her chest crying. She decided to talk to her to see what was going on.

“Hey, are you ok?” Penny asked softly.

“Just go away.” the girl said, sobbing some more.

All Penny could see of her was her shirt, shorts, sneakers, and black hair in a ponytail. She leaned up against the wall with her.

“Hey it’s fine. I promise I won’t hurt you. You can just talk and I’ll listen.”

“Really?” She lifted her head slightly.

“Really.” Penny reassured her.

“It’s just that I don’t know why this is even happening. I never hurt anyone, I haven’t even been near anyone and people just won’t stop attacking me. Most of the time it’s just verbal, but it still hurts. They just go out of their way to do it. And I always try to tell the counselors but they either don’t believe me or don’t care. Sometimes I feel like dropping out of school altogether.”

“Hey don’t be so hard on yourself. You can get through this. I know it.”

“You believe in me?”

“One hundred percent. I don’t care whether or not you’re transgender. If you think you’re a girl then that’s all that matters. As long as you have a sense of care and spirit in your heart nobody should belittle you as much as you have to yourself, and I mean that.” Penny put a hand on her shoulder as the girl wiped away a tear.

“Thanks, that’s the nicest thing anyone’s ever done for me.”

“Well in that case just you wait.” Penny stood up and shouted at the group of girls.

“Hey!” No response.

“Hey you!” Still no response.

“Hey cunts look at me when I’m talking to you!” All three of the girls turn to her in unison.

“What’s your problem?” said the middle girl.

“You’ve got some nerve to be talking to us like that.” Said the short haired blonde to the left.

“Yeah, what she said.” Said the tall girl to the right.

“I hear that you’ve been talking shit about this girl here isn’t that right?”

“Yeah, what’s it to you?” said the middle girl.

“Well the way I see it you owe her an apology.”

“No way am I apologizing to that freak.” She put extra emphasis on that last word.

“I’m only going to say this once. Say you’re sorry or suffer the consequences.” Penny clenched her fists.

“Bite me loser.” She just raised an eyebrow as if she had made the best comeback. Her idiot friends seemed to agree as they snickered.

“Don’t say I didn’t warn you.” The crystal on her blanket started to glow green.

“What’s that?” The girl said, confused.

“The consequences.” The light flashed and engulfed the room. When it cleared the girl was nowhere to be found.

“Where did she go?” Said the girl on the left.

“Yeah what did you do to her?” Saif the girl on the right.

“Why don’t you look down.” Penny said.

The two girls vision slowly panned toward the floor where they found to their horror, a blonde girl about two inches tall and jumping up and down trying to get their attention.

“AAAAAAHH!” The two girls screamed and ran away. They were afraid to be next.

“Well that takes care of that.” Said Penny, picking up the tiny miscreant.

“That was awesome! Your that magic girl who keeps disappearing people aren’t you?” Said the girl by the wall.

“Yep that’s me, Penny. And you are?”

“Chloe. My name’s Chloe.” She stood up.

“Well Chloe, I think I’ll let you hold on to this little one.” She dangled the struggling tiny.

“Well that’s awfully kind of you. Why aren’t you taking her? What do I do with her?” Chloe said unsure of what to do with her former tormentor in the palm of her hand.

“I already have one with me, I didn’t want to be greedy. Plus, it makes sense for her to be with you. I may be a bitch but I’m not a monster like her. As for safekeeping, I’d just use her as an insole if I were you.”

“Thanks for the advice.” Chloe said slipping off her sock. She could hear her last minute screams of “I’m sorry” before she dropped her in without regret and forcefully pulled her sock and boot on.

“Will I see you around Penny?” Chloe asked.

“For sure.” They both waved to each other silently and exited the gym in opposite directions.

“Now what do I do with you.” Penny said grabbing her left butt cheek.
04112.title: Heart to Heart

choices: Tina reluctantly massages Penny's feet.
Before Tina can do anything, Penny shrinks her the smallest she can.
Tina refuses, inflicting more punishment.
041122.content:
Penny hated calculus. She was a bright student, but that particular class just felt like busy work for her. It also didn't help that she hated her teacher. She had spent many class periods imagining slow, humiliating ways to completely subjugate him. However, after practicing restraint earlier in the day, Penny felt the need to let loose.

Walking through the halls, Penny found her favorite hiding place. Room 415 was almost always empty. It was used mainly for conferences between teachers, but other than that it went largely unused. Penny's boots clicked against the tile floor. Then she closed the door behind her, locking it.

She made her way over to the large teacher's desk in the front of the room. Pulling back her waistband, Penny fished out her victim and tossed her onto the table.

"Get up, slut," Penny spat, taking a seat at the soft chair, scooting in closer. She tapped at the wooden tabletop, her nails clacking and echoing in the empty room.

Tina slowly stood up on her two feet. She wanted to cry, but she held back her tears. The last thing she wanted to do was to give her captor the satisfaction of seeing her cry.

"Oh, sweet, sweet Tina," Penny hummed, her voice lowering to a growl. "If only you were smart enough to just keep your pretty mouth shut. Shame, really. I was beginning to like you. I might've even let you join my clique."

Staggering, Tina looked up at Penny in the eye. "Fuck you."

Penny giggled. "What's that? I couldn't hear you." She brought her face closer, nearly pushing Tina over with the tip of her nose. "Say it again to my face."

Tina bit the inside of her cheek. And with a little bit of reckless bravado, Tina spat on Penny's face. "Fuck you!"

Chuckling darkly, Penny wiped away the tiny glob of spit. "Oh, big mistake, little girl. You should know that I can do much worse to you than that."

Penny gathered all the spit in her mouth, swishing it around and pursing her lips. With her right hand, she pinned Tina's legs under her index finger, making sure the tiny girl couldn't escape. The shrunken girl yelped and tried to claw away as she was pressed into the hard table, facing up towards Penny's face.

A large drop of spit escaped from Penny's lips, dangling precariously over the shrunken Tina. The slight strand of saliva stretched as it slowly dripped towards Tina. Despite her struggling, the tiny girl was helpless to the incoming spit as it landed squarely on her face. She coughed and did her best to spit out her torturer's saliva, breathing heavily in between struggling and coughing fits.

"Oh, come on, Tina," Penny teased. "It wasn't even that bad."

Penny pursed her lips again right before letting out a much stronger blast of spit. Compared to the teasing drop from before, the large glob of spit was enough to encase Tina completely. The viscous liquid was enough to submerge the shrunken teenager. Penny let go of Tina and watched her squirm. A smile crept up on her lips.

Tina wanted to puke. She had swallowed an ungodly amount of Penny's spit. Everything seemed to move in slow motion as she watched a lake sized pool of spit rain down on her from her giant torturer's mouth. She screamed and struggled harder to no avail as it hit her, nearly drowning her. She fought against the sticky liquid, struggling to swim to the top. Once she escaped, she rolled away from the ever expanding wave and lay on the table, taking in large breaths of sweet air.

"Alrighty," Penny spoke, holding back a chuckle. "Here's the deal, you're mine for the whole week. Do everything, and I mean everything I tell you to do, and I'll return you to normal. Sound good?"

Tina didn't respond, still struggling to breathe.

Penny hummed. "If you refuse to obey or you tell anyone what I did to you after the week is up, I'll shove you so far up my ass that you'll be living in my colon and eat shit for the rest of your life. You got that?"

There was no response.

"Good," Penny said. "Let's start off with something simple, just so you know your place in life." She kicked her feet up on the desk. Using no effort at all, she kicked off her boots, letting her socked feet air out. She wiggled her toes and slowly peeled off her socks using her feet. Smiling, she watched Tina cower in fear as everything began to sink in. "Massage my feet, Tina."

Tina swallowed the lump in her throat, staring up at a pair of feet that were the size of skyscrapers. Even Penny's smallest toes dwarfed her, which was something she didn't want to think about.

0411222.content:
Smirking, Penny flicked her wrist and the crystal on the bracelet she wore began to glow a bright green. Tina let out a small yelp as she realized what was happening. She collapsed to the ground, completely dizzy as she watched the world around her get larger.

"N-no, no no no! This shouldn't be possible! Penny please stop!" Tina was on her knees, begging for mercy that would never come.

She was absolutely microscopic. At one-sixteenth of an inch, Penny was nearly a mile high compared to her. There was absolutely no way for Tina to even have a chance of following Penny's orders. She looked upwards at Penny's feet. They towered taller than any building she had ever seen.

"My..." Penny boomed, her voice purring. "You're so insignificantly tiny. Wow, that's kind of hot. I bet I could shrink a bunch of people I hate and have them live between my toes. That'd be really nice." She wiggled her massive toes some more. "Well? What are you waiting for? Get to work."

Penny laid her toes on table, pushing them dangerously closer to Tina. The shrunken girl swallowed the lump in her throat. The giant woman's toes were the size of city blocks, including the smallest ones. She couldn't even begin to imagine the kind of hell she would be caught in if she were to be trapped between those colossal digits. Her mind then drifted to her earlier punishment in Penny's ass crack, which made her shiver when compounded with the threat from earlier.

“You’re taking too long.”

Penny took her feet off the table and brought her sock up. Tina watched as the zeppelin sized toes were removed from her vision only to be replaced by the dark opening of a white sock. Equally fast, Penny’s great wall of a hand came down behind her and shoved her at supersonic speed toward the sock.

“You should’ve been quicker to kiss my toes Tina, now you’re spending a week with them in my sock.”

Penny ignored Tina’s squeaks and lowered her colossal foot into the sock. Penny headed off to calculus with a spring in her step. Throughout the last class of the day she just played with her pencil imagining the ways she’d shrink down the teacher without others noticing. She’d regretted making Tina so small as she couldn’t even feel her between her toes. When she got home she’d make her bigger and rub her between her soles. That way Tina would be giving her a foot rub without hesitation. The bell rang and as everyone left the room Penny wanted to stick behind and get in a quick shrink from her teacher but decided against it. Even if the students didn’t know eventually Audrey always finds out. Penny came home to her sister Audrey chewing on something while watching TV.

“Hey Pen, how was school today?”

“Pretty good, I made a new friend today. Her name’s Chloe. Where’s Riley.”

Between mouthfuls Audrey answered “I caught her trying to steal some of my truffles. I figured if she loved them so much then she’d love them even more up close and where the action is.”

“Isn’t that a bit harsh?”

“These truffles cost thousands of dollars. I’m not letting them go to waste. I would’ve been willing to share but she got greedy.”

“Can I have some truffles?”

“Sorry, I ate all of them already. But you can take Riley if you want. She’s lost her flavor for me.”

Audrey reached between her lips and pulled out a saliva drenched Riley by her ankle. She was dropped into Penny’s awaiting palm as she gave a reluctant and grossed out thanks. Penny kicked her shoes off and sat cross legged on her bed.

She dropped Riley onto the sheets and said to her. “You must’ve really wanted those truffles huh, you should know better than to get between Audrey and her food.”

Riley got up on all fours and gave a pathetic cough. “Whatever that monster told you isn’t true. I was trying to get some perspective shots for my photography class so I shrunk myself down. The problem was that Audrey wasn’t looking where she was eating so now she thinks I’m some thief.”

Penny stretched out her legs leaving Riley between her thighs. “Wow, that sucks Riles.”

“I know it’s total bullshit. So, you’re gonna grow me back right?”

“Oh I never said anything about that. I figured that since you’re still on your punishment you could give me a foot massage.” Penny stretched her arms over to her toes leaving her sister to gaze upward at her chest.

“But, you agreed with me. My punishment is baseless.” Penny returned her arms back to her side. “That doesn’t mean we shouldn’t take advantage of this while we can. You can never have too much time to get to know me better. And by me I mean my feet.”

“C’mon Penny you know I’d do the same for you.”

“I know, that’s why you’re such a pushover. Now get to my feet, they ache.”

“No! They’re always so smelly. Sometimes I think you do it on purpose.”

Penny looked down at her sister with a pouty face. “But Riley, you know how rare it is that I get one of my sisters all to myself. Rub my feet, please.”

Riley thought to herself. She knew that this was totally unfair, but in Riley’s back asswards way of thinking she figured that she owed Penny. She was right in that it was so rare for one of the sisters to be shrunken down for her. Rubbing her feet was the considerate thing to do. God, she needed to more assertive.

“Oh all right.”

Penny started excitedly clapping. “Oh goody!” Riley started walking down the hall of her little sister’s bare legs toward her right foot.

“Also if it isn’t too much trouble Riles could you kiss my soles too. They like to be pampered.”

Riley called back “Anything for my sis.” She stared upward at the foot as Penny rolled off the sock to reveal a sweaty sole. She was only as tall as the ankle.

“I guess I’d better get to work.” Penny laid her head on a pillow and pulled out her phone. She’d figured now was as good a time as any to start texting her friends, when she had a tiny foot massager as usual.

A few minutes into the massage Riley was trying as hard as she could to put her back into it and smooch the sole when she noticed something going on with Penny’s other foot. She looked up at where the arch was and saw something tiny crawl out of the hole in her sock and fall down to the sheets. Peeking around the corner she saw Penny was distracted talking on the phone to her friends. She quickly dashed over to the left foot and picked up the tiny thing to realize that it was a girl. She was no bigger than her own big toe. Riley figured that this was a new victim for Penny. If Audrey found out about this surely she’d be in enough trouble to get punished. And maybe Riley would get her crystal back. She slipped the micro in her back pocket and went back to work on Penny’s foot.

Is she caught?

041122211.content:
Penny was talking was chatting with her friends, mostly about Chloe and the drama that happened in the locker room today.

“And then I handed Chloe that shrunken blondie and said I may be a bitch, but at least I’m not a monster.”

“Wow, that was pretty badass Penny.” said Heather.

“What did she do with her next?” asked Lana, the ever-curious sadist.

As Penny took a second to focus on her feet in front of her she noticed Riley dash from one foot to the other and back again.

Riley went back to work on her sister’s feet. God they were huge. Why did she have to be so small. She could’ve just had her massage them at normal size and then shrink her as punishment if she refused. That would have been more effective.

“Hey Riley?”

Damnit. Riley walked away from where she was to between her sister’s feet where she could see her. Wall-height legs were on either side of her. They were clean-shaven and stretched a distance ahead to her denim short shorts. The body continued upward as Riley gazed at the pink tank top that held Penny’s chest. Her sister’s arms were crossed and her face had a quizzical look to it.

“You wouldn’t lie to me right?”

“No never, what makes you say that?” Riley crossed her arms behind her back.

“Well, I couldn’t help but notice that you took a break from massaging my foot to move to the other only to move back again. Can you tell me why that is?”

She started to sweat nervously. “I saw a bug and I tried to remove it but it crawled into a hole in your sock so I moved back.” Her knees were shaking.

“Is that so? Let me see.” Penny lifted her left foot to her face to inspect the sock.

“Hmm, I’m not noticing any bug in here.” Riley was sweating bullets. Why did she think that was a good lie?

“However one thing I did notice was that a tiny that was in my sock is now missing. You wouldn’t know anything about that would you?” Penny put her foot back down by slamming it into the bed, obviously trying to freak her out.

“What, do you not trust your own sister? Can’t I just get back to massaging your divine soles?” Riley hoped that if she could stroke her sister’s ego she could avoid this entirely.

“I’ll even get between your toes and clean out the gunk for you, my lovely sister” Penny crossed her arms and stared at the ceiling before looking back at her.

“No” Then before Riley could react she saw her left hand reach out and pinch her legs between her thumb and forefinger. Penny held her sister above her palm and starting shaking her. Then, out of Riley’s back pocket fell a minuscule girl almost too small to be seen by the human eye. Almost.

“Aha! I knew it!” Riley was doomed.

“Did you really think you could this sneak past me? You really thought you had me didn’t you? Well now you’re really in for it. I’m gonna put you somewhere you’ll never think about lying to me again.”

“And where is that exactly?” Riley was scared out of her wits.

Penny took her left hand over her running shoes and released Riley into them. She then got changed into a pair of running shorts and put on a sports bra. 0411222112.content:
“Thanks but no thanks. I’m going on a jog.”

“Alright suit yourself.”

Penny walked outside the door and looked across the street. She could see the gorgeous trees with their leaves having turned their summer green. The joggers were running around the dirt path, getting their exercise in. Penny took in a deep breath. God she loved being so close to the park, it made it so much more convenient for her to torture her victims. “Well I guess I’m off.” And with that she started running, her two tinies in tow.

Meanwhile Riley was having a hard time adjusting to her surroundings. It seemed like mere moments ago she was rubbing her sister’s feet “As I gesture of generosity I might add” and now she was being trampled by the very same foot. The stench was unbearable and Riley kept her mouth and eyes closed at all times to avoid any sweat getting in. Riley knew that in addition to her sister being on the basketball team, she also ran track, so this wasn’t likely to be a quick jog. Even worse, before it was over the shoe was likely to fill up with her sweat and poor riley would be swished and squished like mouthwash; dirty mouthwash.

Up north, in Penny’s underwear Tina was having an unarguably worse time. Anybody who says that butthole sweat isn’t as bad as foot sweat is a liar. Also, Penny had her shrunken down to practically microscopic size and was thus that much more effected by the smell. There was also her butt cheeks, constantly shaking, and constantly knocking her nearly to the point of unconsciousness. Tina knew that Penny’s butt wasn’t that big, in fact most of the girls considered it small even compared to the rest of her body. But that didn’t matter when you were a microbe tucked in the back of her panties. This was just a never ending hell for her, that was until she could feel the motion dying down. Was this her chance to escape? Did she have the strength left? Was she too small to make it out in time? Only one way to find out.

Penny stopped running to take a drink from the water fountain. The water was ice cold, just how she liked it. “Might as well take a break and give these two a rest.” She thought, sitting down on the wooden bench wiggling her butt to get comfortable. Torturing tinies was hard work. She earned this. Penny untied her sneakers and took her feet out. She lifted one unto her knee to get a closer look at her sister. Her sweat had made her plastered to the sole. She chuckled a bit looking at her paralyzed sister and leaned back and took her phone out of her pocket. Well I heard through the grapevine that they’re at the park by your house now getting something to eat. If you want to pick up where you left off then you know what’s up.” Penny texted a thank you back to her and put her phone back in her pocket. After scanning her surroundings for a few seconds she found what she was looking for: two dumb blondes by a food truck. “Well I’ll be damned. Guess I might as well go over there.”

Riley felt great relief once Penny stopped running. Knowing her sister this was only a short respite from her torture but it was welcome regardless. Unexpected however, was her being airlifted out of the sneaker and given a view of her sister’s face. She had been mingling with the sweat for so long that she couldn’t unstick her limbs or mouth. She wasn’t really sure what she would do or say anyway, there was no point. After less than a minute of gazing from the view of Penny’s sole she had been thrusted from her position on her sister’s knee and face first into the dirt and grass. After coming to the conclusion that her sister had decided to go on a barefoot stroll she wasn’t sure if this was better or worse than before.

Penny could see the two girls sitting in camping chairs eating and laughing. As she got closer she could see one of the girls noticed that she was facing her and signaled to the other girl that she was coming. Penny sat down in one of the chairs and said

“Well what do we have here? Tweedledee and Tweedledum enjoying their lunches I see.”

One of the blondes spoke up “Those aren’t our names!”

“Well I suppose I never found out your names, what are they?”

The other girl, much taller than the both of them replied “I’m Mandy”

“And I’m Candy”

“And what’s the name of your missing crew member?”

Candy and Mandy just looked down at their laps.

“Jeez, y’all are so quiet it’s like somebody died here”

“Somebody did die!” Candy bursted.

“Who?”

“Sandy, the girl you shrunk.”

“Wow. Mandy, Candy, and Sandy. That’s really something. Anyway, she didn’t die I’m just having a friend hold unto her for a while. She’s getting what she deserves”

“What do you mean?” Asked Mandy timidly.

“I mean that girl you were making fun of in the locker room is getting her body hydraulic pressed by a trans girl’s foot.”

Candy piped in “So you mean that pervert-”

“Her name is Chloe”

“I don’t care what his name is he was invading a space meant for women!”

“Ok first of all it’s “she” not “he” and second of all it seemed more like you were invading her space than she was invading yours. I found her in tears all by herself. She wasn’t bothering anyone.”

“He was bothering everyone by bringing his penis into a room meant for vaginas.”

“Ok wow doesn’t that seem hypocritical? I mean you called her invasive yet you somehow know what genitals she has? Plus it’s extra hypocritical since I know how many guys you have sex with on the DL, so this sudden “women only” crusade seems pointless when I hear that people keep finding used condoms by your stuff. If you can let guys raw you but won’t let some girl go to the bathroom then you’re the real problem.”

Candy didn’t really have anything to say to that.

“And one last thing, I know for a fact that no matter what she has in her underwear you’d never let her in anyway. Because the future is going faster than daddy’s money can keep up. Chloe is a triple A award winning franchise and you’re a direct to video box that couldn’t even meet it’s budget if it tried.”

The two girls looked away awkwardly “Whatever, I’m still going to sue the school and I’m going to win.”

Penny let out a deep sigh as she put both her dirty feet onto the table. “Look I can’t force you to not be a bigot, I know that. But I can force you to kiss both of my feet. Here. Now.”

Penny eyed the food in front of her. “Hey what’s in that sandwich?”

Penny pulled the plate closer to her and said “I’m just wondering what it’ll taste like once I put some candy in it.”

After a sudden green flash of light Candy found herself sitting in what she thought was a bed until she looked around and noticed it was her chair from before but huge! She looked to her right and saw her friend Mandy, only she must’ve been over a hundred feet tall! She had this look of worry on her face that she didn’t understand until she looked to her left and saw two fingers the size of trees pinch her sides and lift her into the air. A second later she found herself looking at Penny with a smile so large and scary it made her blood freeze.

“Bon appetit bitch.”

Then she was dropped into bunch of sticky slime that she could only assume was honey, which meant one thing. Once she looked all she could see was the sky darkening as the bread was placed on top of her. Penny grabbed the sandwich with her right hand and was about to take a bite when she looked over at a horrified Mandy.

“What are you doing? Get to work!” Mandy grabbed Penny’s left foot and started kissing it ferociously.

“Yes Penny.”

“By the way, it’s not Penny anymore, call me goddess.”

“Yes goddess, sorry goddess.”

Penny took a bite out of her sandwich and reached into her back pocket for her phone. She rotated herself in order to take a selfie, making sure to get her servant Mandy in the shot. She then sent the picture to Heather with a caption “mission accomplished.”

041122212.content:
Riley couldn't believe her luck. Thanks to Penny, she now had pass to be returned to normal. Of course, she felt sorry for the little thing, but she would get help as soon as she could. For now, Riley had to wait until she got a chance to get to Audrey.

The shrunken woman worked on her younger sister’s foot, kneading her hands into Penny’s sole. All she had to do was not screw up, and hopefully get her freedom back.

After about half an hour, Penny got up from the bed, not caring if she steamrolled over her tiny sister. She made her way out of the room and towards the bathroom. The second Penny went out of sight, Riley sprung into action. She had a few minutes to get out of the room.

Riley ran off towards the edge of the bed. The layout of Penny’s room thankfully made it easy for her to escape since Penny’s bed was near the door. Wasting no time, she slid down the sheets of the unmade bed, something she was used to doing given how often she had been shrunk.

After that, it was a long trip down the hallway, the stairs, and into the living room. Easier said than done, but she’s done it before. After a few minutes of light jogging, an earthquake began, starting in the distance. She kept to the side of the hall, making sure to stay out of sight as Penny walked back to her room. Each footfall from her massive barefoot sister caused a tremor that nearly knocked Riley off her feet. However, she kept her balance still, running past Penny. Now was the time to make a break for it since it wouldn’t be much long after before Penny finds out she’s missing.

Once she got to stairs, she went down each one, climbing down the steps. They weren’t all to kind for her knees. Still, freedom had a price, and the last thing she wanted was to be caught by Penny. She landed on the hardwood floor, and thankfully Audrey was still watching tv.

Exhausted, Riley made her way over to the couch, walking under it as a safety precaution. She emerged the other side and was met with her older sisters massive feet. The giant foot flexed and idly moved around, sometimes coming after Riley.

044.content:
“Hey Penny what’s your next class?” Heather asked.

“History. Or as I like to call it, AP napping.”

“I know, this section on ancient Greece is super boring.”

Penny nodded in agreement. “It’s like they’re trying to make people fall asleep. The only thing that gets me through it is having a tiny to mess with. Speaking of-” Penny looked over at Tiffany who was casually eating her noodles. “What is it?” Penny rubbed the crystal on her bracelet and gave a sly grin.

“But I didn’t even do anything!”

“Oh come on Tiff you know how hard it is for me without my little stress toy.”

“Don’t call me that. Why don’t you pick literally anybody else in this school?”

“Because you’re here and you’re the easy target. It’s not your fault, It’s just the way things are.”

Tiffany turned back to her lunch “Well I don’t feel like being some bitch’s chew toy.” Now she’d done it.

“Just for that I’m putting you in my sock.”

Tiffany witnessed a quick flash of green light and was shrunken down to an inch tall.

“Very poor manners you have Tiffany.” Penny said as she took off her right shoe “I was originally going to put you in my bra.” Tiffany watched as Penny put her giant white sock in front of her and rolled it off her foot. “But now you’ve forced my hand.” Two enormous fingers press into Tiffany’s side as she is lifted into the air and dangled over the sock. “It’s a shame really, because I know how much you’ve been wanting to get close to me like that.” Tiffany took one last look at Penny’s chest before gazing into the abyss that was her sock. “Have fun in there Tiff.” Penny heard a squeak as she dropped her inside.

When she got her shoe back on she told the others “I wasn’t really going to put her in my cleavage. It’s just so much more entertaining when I let her think that she has control over her fate.” Walking to class was hell for Tiffany. The stench was unbearable. Either Penny’s class was farther away than she remembered or she was taking the long way on purpose. Tiffany thought back to Penny’s chest. What she wouldn’t give to be between two giant breasts, shaking lightly as she fell asleep. Penny would occasionally give these “rides” to her other friends but not Tiffany. What was even the point? She needed it more than they did. Penny sat down at her desk and looked at the whiteboard. “There’s a sub today? Anybody know who?” The girls next to her just shrugged their shoulders.

Suddenly a woman in a white blouse and jeans walked into the room “Good afternoon class. I’m Ms. Lancaster and today I’m going to be your substitute teacher.” It was Penny’s sister Audrey.

How did she get here? With a tiny between her toes she now put her to use ash she began kneading her like dough. Penny’s mind raced with worries. What if she sees me? What happened if she notices me slacking off? Could I just shrink myself and sneak out of class?

“Everyone open up to chapter twelve and start taking notes. Make sure to pay attention to anything that helps define democracy in ancient Greece.”

Penny decided to just lay low and wait it out. Over the course of the class, Audrey would periodically walk around the room making sure that students were writing or participating in group discussions. Anytime Penny saw her coming she would just start copying down passages in the book.

“Alright class make sure to study for that test next week.” Once the bell rang Penny tried to duck out as it was her last class of the day but Audrey stopped her. “Penny, I’m going to need you to stay with me.” Penny nervously waited while everyone in the class filed out. “I couldn’t help but notice you weren’t participating much in class or doing any work really.”

“I’ve been having a really tough day today and I’m feeling nervous about the test sis.” Audrey stood up and leaned against her desk.

“Now Penny, just because I’m your sister doesn’t mean I’m going to let you off the hook. However, if you’re looking for studying tips I’d be happy to help you with-” Audrey’s eyes fell toward Penny’s Right shoe which had her foot constantly shifting in it. “I guess you have been having a tough day huh? Sit down and give me your foot.”

“Why?” Penny asked, acting innocently.

“You know why, just sit down.” Penny sat down and lifted up her right leg. Audrey got on one knee and pulled off her shoe “Jesus Penny you and me are going to need to talk later about foot hygiene.”

“I’m sorry, I didn’t know I was going to get an ‘inspection’ today.” Audrey used her middle and forefingers on both of her hands to roll off the sock.

“Watch that attitude Pen, or else I’ll wash you myself and you do not want that.” She was right. Penny remembered that last time she was shrunken down and scrubbed clean like she was a dirty dish. And that was because she spent a week in Audrey’s sweaty sneakers so it wasn’t even technically her fault. “Well what do we have here?” Audrey said having shaken the tiny out of the sock.

“What’s your name little girl?”

Tiffany had experienced a shock as suddenly light flowed back into her eyes. Her vision was occupied by Penny and an unknown mature woman with brown hair and bright green eyes. “It’s Tiffany, ma’am.”

“Hello Tiffany, I was just talking to Penny here and it seems that she’s been treating you unfairly is that right?”

She nodded nervously. “Y-yes, that’s right ma’am.”

“And Ms. Penny over here is very sorry isn’t that right?” Audrey pinched Penny’s ear.

“Ow! Quit it! Yes, Yeah, I’m very sorry for what I did to you.”

Tiffany began to feel a lot less nervous knowing now that Penny was getting punished.

“I’ll make sure that she gets her just desserts but do you need me to take you home Tiffany?”

“Yes please ma’am. I would like that very much.”

“Oh please call me Audrey.” Penny had finished putting her sock and shoe back on and appeared to be waiting on Audrey. “Well Tiffany, I don’t have a reliable way to carry you safely other than, that is, if it’s ok with you, placing you in between my two breasts.” Tiffany’s eyes lit up like fireworks. “It would keep my hands free in addition to providing you with safe and secure area to rest. Now, I know that my breasts are very large and intimidating so if it makes you feel uncomfortable I’m sure I’ll find another way to take you.”

“I’ll do it.” Tiffany replied trying to hide her excitement.

“Are you sure sweetie? I’ve never carried a student before.”

“It’s fine I’ll do it.”

“Well ok then.” Audrey dangled Tiffany above her inviting cleavage. “Don’t get lost in there sweetie.” Audrey said before tucking her in.

“No promises.” Tiffany said to herself.

Audrey dusted herself off and put on a coat before giving Penny a stern look.

“What?”

“You know what. It is ridiculous how many times I’ve told you to stop shrinking people.”

“She called me a bitch!”

“That is no excuse and you know it. Regular adults handle their problems rationally. They don’t make them their slaves. Give me your crystal.”

“Fine.” Penny said with all the reluctance she could muster. She handed over her bracelet and pouted. “Happy now?”

Audrey slipped it into her pocket and grabbed a roll of tape. “Almost.” With a flash of pink light Penny had shrunk down and was looking at her sister’s sandaled feet. “Do you like my nails? I got them painted blue yesterday.” She tapped her toes, which rivaled Penny in height. “Who cares anyway? You won’t be seeing them much.” She slipped her left foot out of its sandal and penny was yanked into the air. “This is for your own good Penny.” Audrey said attaching her to a piece of scotch tape. Audrey then lifted her left foot upwards and stuck Penny to the center of her sole. “See you later!” Audrey waved right before Penny was introduced yet again to her sister’s footwear.

1.content:
For Riley Lancaster, the best thing about having size changing powers, aside from toying with her sisters, was the fact that it made packing so much easier. She had an entire apartment’s worth of furniture, clothes, and food inside her backpack’s pencil pouch. Of course, she made sure to brag about it to her followers, posting a picture online of her dorm and then one of its contents fitting in the palm of her hand.

She stood just outside her house. She figured she could grow herself and just rip off the roof to make an entrance but decided not to. The last time she tried, she spent the entire winter break inside her sister Audrey’s slippers. Her Christmas gift was a day away from her sister’s feet. Needless to say, Riley settled for the front door.

Inside, Riley spotted Audrey sitting on the couch.The oldest sister sat with her feet on the couch and a bowl of popcorn in her hands. She spotted her returning sister and waved.

“Oh, Riley, you’re here already?”

Riley nodded and set her bag on the floor. “Yeah, Mom and Dad got me a bus ticket.”

“You could have mailed yourself. I would have loved to open you up in a package,” Audrey chuckled before stuffing her face with some more popcorn.

Riley rolled her eyes. “And then you’ll ship me to Canada.”

“Nothing that drastic,” Audrey shot back. She held her hand to her heart. “You think too low of me.”

Joining her sister on the couch, Riley grabbed a handful of popcorn. “So where’s Mom and Dad?”

“Antartica,” Audrey hummed, “or the North Pole. I didn’t bother asking which. All I know is that there’s a fuck-ton of snow.”

“I thought they left next week.”

“Nope.”

Riley took some more popcorn. “Where’s Penny?”

Audrey laughed and shook her bowl of popcorn around.

Feeling her stomach drop, Riley spat out the glob of food in her mouth and fingered through it, searching for a speck sized girl. “Oh God, what did you do?”

“You should be asking what she did.” Audrey popped another piece of popcorn before setting aside her bowl. “You won’t believe this. She kept her ex inside her boot for three days. Three days, Rile. I can’t let something like this go unpunished.”

Riley shot up from the couch. “I’m going to check and see if I ate her.”

“Relax, sis,” she shot back. She dug inside the popcorn bowl and pulled out a tiny speck. “Here she is.” Audrey held out her tiny sister for Riley to see. Sure enough, their youngest sister was sitting on the tip of Audrey’s finger. “Aaand she’s gone,” she hummed right before sucking her finger.

“Jeez, you’re going to really hurt her like that.”

“Sheece thine.” Audrey stuck her tongue out. “Thee?”

Riley leaned in and spotted her shrunken younger sister. The tiny girl was stuck on the tip of Audrey’s tongue, too dazed to realize what was happening. She tried to squirm, but the saliva kept her trapped.

Audrey scraped at her tongue and picked off her sister with her fingernail. She wiped her saliva soaked finger off on the couch and flicked her wrist. Within seconds, Penny began to grow back to her normal size.

“I hate you,“ Penny mumbled, staring down her oldest sister.

Audrey only laughed. “You know the rules, kiddo.”

“Whatever,” Penny scoffed. “Can I get my crystal back now?”

The oldest sister shook her head. “Nope. Mom said I can take it away if I think you’re misbehaving. And you are, so I’ll give it back after three days.”

“Three days?!” Penny fell back on her chair, not caring if her spit soaked hair stained the couch. “What am i supposed to do until then?”

Audrey pointed at her sock-clad toes. “You could always start Summer off on the right foot.”

Penny stood up and began to walk away. “I’m going to my room.”

Just as quickly, there was a snap of fingers and Penny immediately shrunk back to her size at a quarter of an inch tall. She groaned and let out a yell as she was plucked back into the air.

“Not so fast, Penny,” Audrey taunted, dangling her shrunken sister in the air. “I’m not finished yet.”

Penny yelled some expletives, but Audrey couldn’t hear it. Her heart began to race again as she realized how high in the air she was.

“Like I mentioned earlier,” Audrey started, sitting back onto the couch and joining her sister Riley, “Mom left me in charge, and what I say goes. So, I’ve decided that..."


Bonus Chapter Zero: "New Scenarios"
