"Just..."

"Like..."

"This." She opened wide giving her sister a great view straight down to her slimy tonsils and bell of a uvula. Her tongue wiggled impatiently, waiting for its "cherry".

Penny could'nt help but grin as Riley toyed with her. Humid wind blasted her as the massive tongue splayed out to greet her. She held her breath as she was slurped by the behemoth muscle, her entire upper-body coated in saliva. She watched as Riley responded with an exaggerated recoil.

"Ugh! You actually taste awful." Riley dropped her glistening sister on her chin.

"Oh, darn! I was so looking forward to you eating me!" Penny brushed at her hair now drenched in spit.
1123121.title: Hanging Out

choices: Penny gets her foot tangled in Riley's pasta.
Dinner goes by and they're off to the movies.
11231211.content:
"Mmh, this ish good," Riley said as she stuffed another forkful of spaghetti in her mouth.

"Thanks, Riles," the oldest sister responded. She twirled her fork in her mountain of pasta.

Penny sat off on the edge of Riley's plate, far enough away from her sister Audrey. She took bites from a single noodle that was drenched in sauce. Chewing on her piece, she watched her sisters eat, thanking everything that she wasn't anywhere near Audrey's fork.

"I was thinking we could catch a movie," Audrey brought up. "It'll be fun to spend some time with you since you've been gone for a bit."

"Sounds cool," the younger sister said.

As the two decided on what to see...
11231211.title: Dinner Time

choices: Riley
Audrey
112312112.content:
The two older sisters chatted idly as they entered the movie theater. They had argued earlier on what to see but somehow managed to agree by the time they got to the box office. Another argument occurred over what drink to get. However they both enthusiastically agreed on popcorn.

"You go get our seats while I go put butter on this popcorn, kay Riles?" Audrey asked, grabbing the large tub of popcorn and making her way to a small counter on the sides of the concession stands. Riley only nodded in response as she disappeared down the hall.

Once Riley was down the hall, Audrey felt a smirk begin to tug on her lips. She turned her attention down at her chest and plucked a tiny, squirming figure from between her breasts.

"Hey, Pen," Audrey said, holding back a giggle. "You ready to see a movie?"

Penny didn't respond, choosing to instead swear under her breath.

Smiling, Audrey dangled her sister over the cardboard tub of popcorn. "You see, I'd hate to reuse an idea in the same day, but it's very apropos given where we are. Let's just hope you end up in my handful. The last thing you'd want is for Riley to eat you without knowing."

Without another word, Audrey let go of her sister and watched the tiny teenager plummet into her snack.

Screaming, Penny tumbled downwards until she came into contact with a piece of popcorn, slamming hard into that her breath was knocked out immediately on impact. She continued to slide and roll down the slopes until she fell in a slight nook of a piece of popcorn just big enough to hold her. Wheezing, Penny made no attempt to escape as she'd rather focus on getting her breath back and her strength up.

Audrey then placed the tub underneath a dispenser for warm butter. She poured a ridiculously unhealthy amount of butter, making sure it flowed to the bottom of the popcorn. Once she felt that there was enough, Audrey shook to tub to thoroughly spread the add on. She smiled, imagining her little sister glued to a piece of popcorn just waiting to be eaten. Who knows when she'd be eaten. Maybe early on during the trailers when there is nothing better to do than to eat the snacks, or somewhere in the middle of the movie when the two sisters would be mindlessly funneling popcorn into their mouths without thinking.

Penny took deep, slow breaths in an attempt to cool her nerves. However, this didn't really help much since there was a constant threat of being eaten by her older sisters, a situation that was quickly developing into a pattern. Then she smelled the scent of butter and immediately began to realize what was happening. Seconds later, a torrent of butter began to pour all around her like brownish-yellow waterfalls. The rain never seemed to let up as it quickly began to come towards Penny.

She let out a frightened scream before scrambling to her feet in an attempt to get away. Unfortunately, her minuscule size didn't let her get far as a viscous wave of melted butter was too fast for her. She was swept by the wave, with only her head floating, which she was somewhat thankful for. Although things got worse as she realized that the drop of butter she was stuck to began to slow down. Once it stopped completely, Penny tried to fight her way out of it only to confirm her thoughts that she was trapped to a piece of popcorn. She was trapped and would most likely be eaten by one of her sisters.

Satisfied with herself, the oldest sister made her way to the theater where Riley was already inside. She entered and scanned the theater, looking for her sister around her favorite seats. Unfortunately, those seats were already taken, which led Audrey to grimace as she found her sister a few rows back.

Sitting down next to Riley, Audrey passed over the bucket of popcorn. "Here you hold it. Otherwise, I'm gonna eat the whole thing before the movie starts."

Riley chuckled before taking a handful and stuffing it into her mouth. "Alright then."

"You didn't even get my favorite seats," Audrey chided.

"They were taken," Riley shot back.

Audrey chuckled. "You could've shrunk and sat on them. Problem solved."

Riley only rolled her eyes.

"Kidding," Audrey defended. "We're allowed to joke about it."

"Speaking of shrinking, where's Penny?"

Audrey smiled and looked her younger sister dead in the eyes. Right after, Audrey cupped her breasts and began to wiggle them around and mashed them together.

"Oh my god, you're ridiculous."

Audrey laughed again. "Relax, Riles, these babies are probably the softest part of my body. Or would you rather I sit on her?"

Riley shook her head, before taking another handful of popcorn.

As the movie progressed, the two sisters watched intently, eating handfuls of popcorn with little to no care about what was in it, leaving Penny to be scooped up and eaten by...
112312112.title: Penny vs Popcorn: Round Two

choices: They hang out in one of Riley's miniature sets.
Riley makes Penny the subject of one of her videos.
Riley pulls out some kind of contraption designed for a tiny person.
12.content:
"Wait, what?" Riley asked, turning to face her older sister.

"You heard me," Audrey said. She focused her attention on the speck between her fingers. "And I know you heard me, Pen. Do everything Riley says, or you'll be dealing with me after." Audrey smiled and deposited Penny into her younger sister's hand. "I want her back in one piece, but do everything you can to make her a model citizen."

Riley huffed. "That's a really fine line."

"I'm sure you'll manage," Audrey responded, getting up from the couch. “Now if you'll excuse me. I have to make sure Penny's ex doesn't do something stupid like call a lawyer." Without another word, she went upstairs, leaving Penny alone with Riley.

“Hey, Penny,” Riley greeted, unsure what to do with her prisoner. She held up her sister to her ear.

“Hi,” the tiny sister said, hoping to get on Riley’s good side. “Please tell me Audrey gave you my crystal.”

Riley grimaced. “Sorry, sis… she didn’t.”

“Of course.” Penny grit her teeth. “So what now?”

“Well, I’ve got some things I made at my school that I’d like to test. You wouldn’t mind, right?”

Penny bit her lip. Anything brought or conceived by Riley while she was at college were the results of sleep deprivation from last minute essays, alcohol fueled parties, or pot circles, sometimes even a combination of all three. Still, she had to do whatever Riley said or else her punishment would be extended.

Even then, Riley was oddly passionate about anything that was even remotely creative. So saying no wasn’t much of an option.

“Fine,” Penny said into her sister’s ear.

“Alright!” Riley cheered, pumping her free hand into the air.

In a swift moment, Penny felt the world cave in as Riley closed her hand. Thankfully, the larger sister left more than enough space for Penny, while also keeping her sister safe.

Riley made her way upstairs. It had been a while since she slept in her room. The last time she did, it had been the week of Thanksgiving, given that she spent her winter break under Audrey’s foot.

Her room, at a passing glance, appeared to be a miniature model showroom. Aside from a bed and dresser, Riley's room was filled with miniature cities, towns, and landscapes. More often than not, she liked to shrink herself down and live in one of the models to escape the stressors of life. At the center of her room was a model train set of a small country town with rolling hills. Of course, she also had a model castle that she sometimes used as a bedroom.

Walking to the corner of the room, Riley toppled down on her bed, closing her hand around her sister to keep her from falling out. She stretched her palm out and made a downward slope pointing down at her chest. However, Penny was unprepared for the sudden change in angle and found herself tumbling down the fleshy ramp and on top of Riley's right breast. While they weren't as big and imposing as Audrey's, Riley's breasts were still big enough to completely dwarf the shrunken teenager.

"Whoops, sorry about that," Riley said sheepishly as she watched her tiny sister get up to her feet. Smiling, she petted her younger sister on the head, further annoying Penny. "So... what to do with you?"
12.title: Riley’s in Charge

choices: The sandals.
The necklace.
The remote control car.
123.content:
Riley's eyes shot open and a smile broke out on her face as an idea popped into mind. She had to fight the urge to jump up to her feet. Still, she kept composed and slowly closed her hands around her sister before sitting up.

"I got an idea," Riley said into her hand, still beaming.

"Oh no," Penny mumbled under her breath. She recognized that tone. Nothing good came from that tone. Even if it wasn't as painful or dangerous as Audrey's brand of fun, Riley's shenanigans were almost always embarrassing or humiliating in the worst ways.

Placing Penny on the bedside drawer, Riley dug around in her backpack, pulling out a handful of items.

"Okay, I'm gonna let you pick what we're going to test, okay Pen?" Riley placed the objects onto the drawer next to Penny before growing them to their normal sizes. She gestured to a pair of sandals. "Okay starting off, this is—"

"They're flip-flops, Riley," Penny cut off, unimpressed.

Riley shook her head. "Nah, Pen, they're more than that." She brought her hand to the thong of the sandal, gesturing to a harness that resembled a hanging rollercoaster seat. "See, they have a little seat in them for you to ride in."

"Right..." Penny grumbled. "Because it'll be fun to ride around between your toes."

Riley then gestured to a little glass heart shaped locket with a similar seat attached inside of it. "And this is..."

"Same as before, but a necklace," Penny interrupted, noticing a theme.

"Yup," Riley responded, nodding. "Though the last, and the most fun, in my opinion is this one."

Riley dug inside her pocket before pulling out a tiny toy car. It was a gaudy shade of blue and designed in a way to appear more cool than aerodynamic, which made it obvious that it was a kid's toys. However, like the sandals and the necklace, there was a seat attached to the interior.

"Oh, okay," Penny said, her voice picking up at the different object.

"My mechanic friend helped me rig a Hot Wheels car with a remote control set up from another toy car." Riley put her finger on top of the toy car and pushed it back and forth idly. "Then we added an actual interior to make sure it was rideable. Now I need a test passenger to make sure it all works together. So! What'll it be?"

Penny swallowed a wad of spit that had been welling up in her mouth. Her gut twisted as she realized that she was going to be strapped in one of these death traps. Still, she had to pick one, so she went with...
123.title: Pick Your Poison

choices: Riley walks to a friend's house.
She goes somewhere else.
1231.content:
Penny weighed her options unenthusiastically. The thought alone of hanging hundreds of feet up in a glass heart made her knees buckle. Riley couldn't pay her to ride in the locket. The car didn't seem all that safe at second glance either. Visions of wild crashes wouldn't leave Penny's head. That left one option...

"I guess...the flip-flops," Penny forced out. Riley's huge grin only widened.

"Awesome!" Riley pinched up her tiny sister. She lowered Penny down close to the seat. "Make sure you're strapped in tight. Wouldn't want you getting thrown out."

"I'm sure." Penny muttered to herself as she looked wearily at the padded seat. The rubbery arch it was attached to reached high above her head, spliting in two as it stretched further down the massive sandal. She glanced up at her mountain of a sister before she buckled herself in. She brought the heavy restraints down over her shoulder. The youngest sister paused as it locked into place. "Where the hell did she get a rollercoaster seat?"

Riley could hardly contain herself. Audrey had given her a personal little assistant for the next three days. She usually had to beg, blackmail, or otherwise coerce her sisters into helping with her more...creative ideas. She'd be sure to get as much use out of her minuscule charge as possible. Riley stood, sliding her foot into the sandal.

"Ugh." Penny watched peachy toes, each big enough to crush their house, slide toward her. She wrinkled her nose as they rumbled into place. The flesh around her unsurprisingly reeked of stale sweat mixed with body wash. If Penny weren't absolutely puny it probably wouldn't have been that bad. Walls of skin engulfed her view, leaving her isolated between Riley's colossal digits.

Riley happily wriggled her toes around the tiny girl. So far so good. "Alright, we're gonna go for a little walk so just hang on."
1231.title: One Giant Step

choices: Riley visits her friend Cynthia, who's really into Riley's size powers.
Wild Card. Introduce a friend.
12311.content:
The first step was enough to send Penny's heart directly into her stomach. In less than a second, she was rocketed into the air. Her hand immediately gripped the metal handles, feeling herself being pushed into her seat by the escalating g-forces. Then, there was a slight moment of weightlessness as she was carried into the apex of the step. As Riley's foot began to plummet, so did Penny. The tiny girl felt herself being lifted from the seat, her upper body pushed against the restraints. Her stomach lurched and she closed her eyes, realizing this was only one step.

This continued several times over. And each time, Penny would wince and grit her teeth with each meteoric footfall.

Riley walked down the hall, sometimes looking down at her feet. She couldn't really guess how it must have felt like. Maybe it was like a ride at an amusement park. Then the stolen seat would be apt. She wiggled her toes as she got to the top of the stairs, giving her tiny sister a some sort of warning.

Penny found herself gripping the restraints harder. The fleshy walls around her shook and the plastic flooring beneath her began to groan at the shifts in weight. The rank smell seemed to be the least of her problems as Penny realized that she was going to be taken down the stairs.

The rise and fall that came with each step was just below tolerable, just enough to utterly terrify the tiny teenager.

Riley stopped at the front door, turning back to the living room and finding her sister still watching TV.

"Hey, Audrey, I'm going out. I'm taking Penny with me," she called out, not really staying after to hear her response. Stepping outside, Riley noted how hot it was outside. The walk to her friend's house wouldn't be too long, but the heat would definitely get annoying soon. She flexed her toes, feeling the sides of her toes rub up against the harness Penny was strapped into. She could only imagine how bad it would smell once she began sweating.

Riley's smothering toes would close around Penny every time Riley would stop. Beads of sweat rained down on her, drenching the shrunken teenager. She tried her best to keep calm, despite being both humiliated and terrified at the same time. She only wished that the ride would end soon.

The walk was relaxing, especially after a long, overnight bus ride home. She had some friends to see now that she was back in town.
12311.title: Riley's Wild Ride

choices: Riley scoops Penny out of the cone.
She laps up the rest of the ice cream (and Penny).
12312.content:
The walk proved to be anything but "little" for Penny. Every step Riley took was a nightmare for the minute teen. A nausea-inducing swing upward followed by an earth-shattering boom as the mammoth foot plummeted to the ground. The weather wasn't helping. Penny found her self drenched in sweat, more Riley's than her own. The meaty toes around her gave off an overwhelming salty musk. She hoped wherever they were going was close.

Riley walked as lightly as possible, trying not to torture her sister too much. She'd decided to go to an ice cream shop near their house. It was one of her favorite places in town growing up and the heat definitely warranted a trip.

"So how was the ride?" Riley asked the inch-high Penny, holding a scoop of mint chocolate-chip. She'd chosen a table outside the shop away from everyone.

"I was between your big, sweaty toes the whole time," Penny called up. "How do you think it was?"

"Tsk tsk, Pen. I was gonna share this with you but maybe I'll just eat it all myself." Riley took a long lick of the giant dessert for emphasis.

"Is that the best you got? Audrey would probably eat me with the ice cream for saying that."

Riley put on her best evil-Audrey smirk, pinching Penny up from the table. "You think I wouldn't?" She dangled her speck of a sibling over the waffle-cone.

"I know you wouldn't."

"I would." Riley said with as much faux-seriousness as she could muster. She released Penny, letting her tumble toward her snack.

Penny landed with thick splat on the side of the mountainous scoop. She was instantly stuck in the frigid, green mire. Hunks of chocolate the size of pumpkins dotted the gooey landscape. Suddenly, she felt herself dwindling even further. She diminished until she was much smaller than the chip next to her. She rolled onto her back in time to see Riley's face looming closer. Eventually, a massive pair of lips was the only thing in sight.

Penny's teeth chattered violently as she sunk into the sweet tundra. Mint was her favorite flavor but this was definitely too much of a good thing. Above, the soft gates parted allowing a glistening, pink monster to droop out. At this size, now 1/16 of an inch, Riley's tongue was velvety landmass. If she wanted, could have buried Penny under its soggy warmth like she wasn't even there. It slapped into the scoop, narrowly missing the helpless occupant. Penny could feel the humidity emanating from the gargantuan organ. It swept by, leaving a smooth trail wider than a highway in its wake.

Riley repeated this over and over, intentionally missing her sister each time. It was oddly fascinating to watch the steaming muscle cook down a veritable mountain. By the end the was just a small lump of ice cream left sinking into the cone. Penny was trying her best not to be entirely engulfed in what was left of the melting treat.

Riley licked her lips, surveying her destruction. She could just barely make out Penny, trying to stay afloat in the muck. She felt a little guilty watching the pitiful sight. Then again Penny had called her bluff...
12312.title: Chillin'

choices: Riley accidentally swallows Penny.
Riley lets Penny out.
123122.content:
Riley couldn't help but giggle as she watched her shrunken sister struggle in the mountain of ice cream. For a few seconds, Penny would disappear under the pastel green mass, only to reappear gasping for air. After watching that, the older sister couldn't help but take another lick of ice cream, swirling her tongue around the general area that held Penny. She savored the minty taste, almost forgetting about her near microscopic sister's predicament. She pulled her mouth away from her scoop of ice cream, watching as another mudslide's worth of mint and chocolate chips bury Penny.

"Don't worry, Penny," she said, holding back a laugh. "I'll get you out."

She brought the ice cream closer to her lips, this time taking no consideration for Penny's position. If the tiny girl ended up in her mouth, then that was her problem. Sometimes, shed feel a lump on the center of her tongue. Unsure if it was either Penny or a chunk of a chocolate chip. She didn't really care either way.

Penny let out a scream as she was engulfed by another wave of ice cream. She found herself swallowing absurd amounts of ice cream as she fought to dig herself out of the messy landscape that tried to bury her. Once she clawed her way out, she gasped for air. Not a second later, she was immediately pressed back into her icy prison by a massive, warm monolith that she quickly figured out was her older sister's tongue.

The giant tongue scooped Penny up, carrying the shrunken sister into the depths of Riley's mouth.

The difference of temperatures was obvious. Despite the ice cream coating the surfaces, the inside of Riley's mouth was sweltering. The mix of spit and ice cream made for an uncomfortable combination as Penny found herself deposited in a pool of both. The giant wriggling tongue paid no attention to her, knocking her around and even leaving her behind in places like the fleshy part under Riley's tongue.

"Okay, Riley!" Penny screamed into the void. "You made your point! You're just as bad as Audrey. Now let me out!"

She wasn't truly expecting a response. However, when the giant tongue just collapsed on top of her, she couldn't help but take it as a personal insult. She struggled against the weight of the mass of muscle, finding no possible way of lifting it off of herself.

Outside, it didn't take long for Riley to identify Penny inside her mouth. Even though the shrunken sister was one sixteenth of an inch tall, she was easily traceable given the fact that chocolate chips don't squirm. Her lips curled into her smile, knowing that Penny wasn't having much fun trapped in her maw. She went back to focusing on her ice cream, deciding that once she finished her waffle cone, she would let out her sister. Of course, Riley couldn't help but savor the treat at the expense of Penny staying inside her mouth for a few extra minutes.
123122.title: Licked

choices: Try to cough her back up
Take syrup of icepak to try to throw up
No, vomtting is yucky, just hope she's recognizable when pooed out
1231221.content:
After savoring Penny, she tried to spit her out, but her swallowing muscles were too strong.

Penny tried as hard as she could to stay out of Riley's tunnel of doom, but she couldn't get a hold of anything, because it was all so wet. With a cry she fell!

Oh shit, Riley thought. Panic started to take her. Penny was, IS, still family, after all! She considers her options...
1231221.title: Riley accidentally swallows Penny.

choices: Audrey takes them straight to the apartment.
They grab dinner at a drive-thru.
13.content:
"I don't get why we can't just stay in the house." Riley sat slightly annoyed in the shotgun seat of Audrey's car.



"It's just easier. I didn't have to pack, you already have your stuff. We just had to grab Penny's." Audrey said, pulling out of the driveway. 



"So in other words, you were just too lazy to pack."



"Well, when you say it like that..."



Riley rolled her eyes. She wrinkled her nose as her thoughts drifted to Penny. Not letting the drive interrupt her punishment, Audrey had picked a perfect seat for the youngest sister. Riley gaze floated momentarily to her older sister's chest.



Penny groaned as she sunk deeper in a sea of flesh. She felt something similar to seasickness as everything seemed to rock and sway around her. Nausea swept over as her pliant prison wobbled, probably more than necessary. The walls of tanned skin yielded just enough space for the shrunken girl to squirm fruitlessly. 



She looked up. The cliff-like underside of Audrey's chin was all she could see. She noticed a few apple-sized beads of sweat dotting the chasm she was trapped in. She found herself slipping further into the smooth, humid abyss. She let out a frustrated scream. 

"At least turn on the air-conditioning!"
13.title: To Audrey's House We Go

choices: “I guess. Just don’t get any ideas,” Riley says, shrinking herself.
“You know, I think we're fine like this,” Riley says, clutching her crystal.
"I'm sure the three of us can find enough room at normal size."
131.content:
“The stairs? Really?” Riley whined, following her older sister.

“Yep,” Audrey hummed. “It keeps me fit.”

Riley rolled her eyes, feeling a bit breathless. Audrey lived on the sixth floor, and it didn’t help that the heat was starting to get to them. Riley wiped her forehead, imagining her younger sister’s prison.

Meanwhile, Penny was being pummeled by her oldest sister’s mammoth breasts. With each step, Audrey’s chest bounced, throwing the tiny teenager between them.

Penny grimaced as the walls around her closed in, threatening to chew her up. She felt herself slipping deeper. She tried hugging and holding herself up, grabbing her sister’s flesh. Unfortunately, the surface was too slick from the increasing amounts of sweat. The earthshaking bobbing of Audrey’s chest only served to push Penny down. She screamed, swore, and clawed to keep her positioning in her sister’s cleavage.

However, she was fighting a losing battle. Gravity, Audrey’s sweat, and the sheer force of the jiggling mountains proved too much for Penny to handle. She slid down until it was impossible for her to move any further down. She couldn’t even squirm or wiggle as the full weight of Audrey’s globes pinned her between them.

Audrey giggled, feeling her tiny sister make the plunge until she was stuck. She wiggled her chest, teasing Penny without even putting much effort.

Finally, the sisters reached the sixth floor. The two were covered in sweat as the apartment building had no air conditioning whatsoever, something Audrey purposefully failed to mention.

The inside of the apartment was cramped, for lack of a better word. Everything was designed and built for one. The most accommodating thing inside the apartment was a love-seat, which only seated two. It seemed like there where only the bare essentials for living.

“Wow,” Riley hummed. “Could you have gotten a smaller apartment?”

“Oh hush,” the older sister shot back. “It’s enough space for me.” Audrey dug between her breasts and pulled out a battered Penny. “It’s also enough for the two of you if you’re both the right size. How’s that sound?”
131.title: The Apartment

choices: Audrey falls asleep, leaving them to explore.
Audrey eventually makes dinner.
Riley goes off on her own to get some pictures.
1311.content:
"A quarter-inch should be good." Audrey grinned as her sister dwindled rapidly. She reached down to pluck up the minuscule Riley, cradling her in her palm with Penny. Audrey laid down on the love-seat, leaning back against the armrest. She dropped her sisters onto her belly.

"See! All the room we need." Audrey grabbed the remote and started flipping through the channels. "It'll be like you guys aren't even here."

"Yeah, this is exactly how I want to spend the Summer. Stuck in giant Audrey's apartment." Penny said as she and Riley tried to get their footing on the fabric-covered expanse of Audrey's stomach. The soft landscape rose and fell with each breath.

"If I were you, I'd shut up. The last thing you need is to get in more trouble." Riley warned.

Penny scoffed. She cupped her hand around her mouth. "Hey, Tits Mcgee! Your apartment fucking sucks!" She yelled at Audrey's massive chest. The giant sister didn't even flinch. "See, nothing."

"Whatever, just be careful." Riley took out her phone. At least she'd be able to get some good pictures for her followers.
1311.title: Making Room

choices: "Audrey's room. There's gotta be something weird or interesting there."
"The kitchen. I could probably get some cool pictures taken."
Reader's Choice
13111.content:
A slight rumble sounded in the distance as the two shrunken sisters realized that Audrey must have nodded off. Penny huffed and looked over towards the rising and falling mountain range that was her sister's chest. She crossed her arms and tried to think of what to do. She turned to her sister, who already began sliding down Audrey's shirt and onto the couch.

"Hey! Where ya going?" Penny asked, running after her older sister.

"Exploring, wanna come with?" Riley asked, before jumping off the couch and landing on a discarded throw pillow.

Penny weighed her options. She could join her sister Riley or deal with her slumbering giant sister. At first, the decision seemed easy until she looked off the edge of the couch and immediately felt a sense of vertigo. Her stomach dropped, realizing the height she had to jump. Maybe sticking with Audrey wasn't so bad after all. She looked back at Audrey's massive form and got another look at how big she was compared to her. Then a slight movement on Audrey's part caused an earthquake, effectively helping Penny make a decision.

Closing her eyes, Penny jumped off the edge, hoping she'd land on the same pillow. Unfortunately, she didn't, instead landing on a pair of crumpled up socks that reeked of Audrey's feet. Still, it was marginally better than the floor. Marginally.

"Ugh," Penny groaned, before rising to her own feet and making her way down to the floor.

"Oh, good, you're here," Riley said enthusiastically. "It's always much more fun to explore with someone."

Penny didn't respond, choosing to instead follow her sister silently. It continued for a half minute before Penny asked, "Hey, Riley, why did you just shrink yourself like that?"

Riley shrugged. "I dunno. I felt we'd be better off like this."

"How?"

"I still have my crystal," she explained. "That's much better than her finding an excuse to shrink me anyway. Plus she's less likely to punish you if I'm with you all the time."

"Huh," Penny hummed, thinking her sister's answer over. "So where exactly are we going?"
13111.title: Tagging Along

choices: They dig around in Audrey's bedside drawers.
The two take pictures in a pile of Audrey's clothes.
131111.content:
The two sisters slipped under the doorway into Audrey's room. Neither really knew what to expect since the last time they were in Audrey's apartment was after she had just leased the place. Back then, it was very much empty, so there wasn't much to look at.

The room was in need of a cleaning. It wasn't downright filthy, but dirty clothes were discarded around the room. A massive queen sized bed dominated the room with a modest set of drawers to the sides of it.

To Penny, it was just a messy bedroom. To Riley, however, it was a brand new playground in which to take pictures. The older sister scanned the bedroom, looking around for a significant place to start.
131111.title: Audrey's Room

choices: "Take Penny with you."
"Just give me a sec, and we'll go."
"I'll be here with Penny when you get back."
1312.content:
"You're no fun," Audrey hums before plunging her tiny sister back between her breasts. She wiggled her chest and shot a smirk over at Riley, who only rolled her eyes in return.

Penny screamed as she was dropped back. She felt herself slide back down to a rather unfortunate, yet familiar position. This time, she fell face first, with her legs only sticking out of her sister's cleavage. Her head received the worst of the pressure, especially as the globes began to shake around her, squishing her even more.

Riley slumped down on the couch and turned on the TV. She figured she could pass the time and distract herself from her new surroundings. She was much less excited about spending time away from her house but figured it was best to give in to her sister's will. It didn't help that the place didn't allow for much to go on, leaving her bored. She looked out the window and scanned the cityscape for anything to do outside of the tiny apartment.

At this point, the shrunken girl had no idea where she was or which way was up as she constantly was bombarded by building sized chunks of chewed food. As chaotic as everything was, Penny felt that the worst thing was that she had no idea who had just shoved her into their mouth. In fact she wasn't even sure who she'd rather be eaten by. Sure, Riley had a better chance of being treated better if she were discovered, but Penny had also tried to throw her under the bus. So she couldn't really say for sure if Riley would be kind. However, Audrey had a better chance of discovering her, given that she was the one more likely to eat the entire plate. Yet it was a guarantee that Audrey would still be after justice.

Without even a slightest chance of knowing, Penny was trapped in the mouth of her sister...

choices: "You still down to hike to the lake?"
"Wanna just stay in today?"
14122111221221112.content:
Audrey slipped her foot out of her right sock. She wiggled her toes at the cool air. She held her sock up with her free hand and dangled it just below the one with Penny inside of it. She then haphazardly dumped her sister in the opening

When the light returned, Penny found her self clawing at her giant sister's plush palm in an attempt to stay up. She stared down at the opening of her sister's sock and felt gravity pull her down as the slope of her sister's hand was too steep. She tumbled forward and lost all sense of direction as she fell into the depths of the sock.

The smell hit Penny first. It was all too familiar since she spent nearly all of yesterday curled up with Audrey's toes. She fought against the fabric in a last minute attempt to tear through and get out, but it didn't work. The socks were too thickly woven to get through. Penny landed in the bottom and found herself staring skywards just in time to watch five monstrous digits force their way back in the sock.

Audrey's toes hit Penny like a battering ram. The warm skin engulfed her, and she was quickly caught between her sister's giant big and second toes. The digits constricted, squeezing the air out of her lungs. Penny slammed her fists against Audrey's toes.

The oldest sister smiled as se slid her sock back on. She scrunched her toes, feeling the tiny figure bend in between them. Without thinking much of her prisoner's dilemma, Audrey went back to eating her breakfast.

"Hey Riles," Audrey called, biting into a piece of bacon.
14122111221221112.title: Penny's going in her sock.

choices: Wake her up
Vengeance
141221112212211121.content:
“Sure thing sis, I’ll just need to find my camera and art supplies.” She cut her knife into her eggs, using her fork for stability. “Why? Do you have a nature assignment for you art class.” Riley took a big bite of yolk and then chewed on it. “Nope. I just have a feeling that I’m gonna get inspired.” “Inspired huh? Well then you should finish those eggs quickly because we don’t have much daylight left.” “I know, I’m trying” Riley said talking with her mouth full. After breakfast Riley went to her room to get dressed. She found some sandals, jean shorts and a green-and-blue striped tank top. After gathering all her art supplies she walked out of the cabin to see her sister Audrey in a sunflower dress, shades, straw hat, and a pair black boots. “What’s with the boots?” “Well firstly, they’re fun to stomp around in. Secondly, they absorb heat better which should make my little troublemaker regret ever coming near my feet to get my crystal again.” “You ready to head out?” “Yep, lead the way!” Riley noticed her sister putting much more force into the ground than usual. She kinda felt bad for penny, but then again she was trying to rat out on her and there was no way she wanted to end up in her big sister’s boots again. She always tried to stay out of trouble because of it. Meanwhile in Audrey’s boots laid Penny, desperately trying to rebel against her sister’s toes.

“Let me out! Let me out! I was telling the truth! It should be her in here not me!” Her efforts were futile any struggle meant her sister slamming her boot harder into the ground. Plus her screams only resulted in getting more sweat in her mouth. How was it that it was getting so hot already? The stench was unbearable enough. Penny started to wonder if maybe she deserved this. Surely this was cruel and unusual punishment but it’s not like it’s dangerous or anything. Is this what it felt like? Was it really this torturous? All that hate that she feels for her sister now must be what her boyfriend felt for her. Audrey had been tough on her, but fair. Everything that was being done to her was what she did to others. Not anymore, she was going to change that. Once she got out of this prison she was going to be a better person. She promised herself that.

“Well we’re here.” Riley began setting down her canvas and paints. “Alright swimming time.” Audrey threw away her hat and shades and took off her sunflower dress to reveal a red two-piece bathing suit. Walking over to Riley she took off her boots and asked “Hey can you do me a favor? It’s going to be hard to keep track of this toe goblin while I’m in the water. Can you watch her for me?” She balanced her right foot on its heel scrunching her toes repeatedly, no doubt causing penny more pain. “Sure thing sis.” Riley slid her left foot out of its sandal as Audrey took off her sock. With penny between Audrey’s big and second toe she said to her “Have fun with Riley’s soles Penny, I’m gonna take a dip in the lake.” Audrey unclenched her toes and let her sister fall down onto Riley’s sandal. She could practically hear her screaming in fear. Audrey took in the view in front of her. To her left and right were pine trees. Two seas of dark green. In the middle were the mountains capped with snow. Right in front of her was the cliff’s edge facing a drop off of about fifty feet. Thankfully there were stairs down to the lake. As she took all of this in she patted down her figure. She was quite “gifted” even compared to other bombshells. Her breasts were the size of cantaloupes and her butt was barely contained by her swimming bottoms. She was like a goddess to all who came across her. Everyone knew it, even her sisters.

“Hey Riles you having trouble with your painting?” Riley looked past her canvas to see the enormous face of her sister having grown to match the cliff’s height. “Jesus Audrey, you know that it scares me when you do that.” Audrey crossed her arms “I didn’t feel like going back up the stairs.” “But yes you are right. I guess the mood just hasn’t struck me yet.” Audrey turned her head to look over her shoulder at the vast expanse of lake behind her. So much unused space. “Hang on I got an idea.” She started running for the water “What are you going to do?” Riley screamed, trying to keep her supplies from falling over due to her sister’s quakes. “You’ll see!” She roared back. Suddenly she dove into the water. What would be the deep end was about to get pretty shallow. Riley witnessed as she saw her colossal sister expand her size even further. She had become so huge that it looked like she was using the lake like it was a small bathtub. The snowy mountains behind her acted as a headboard/throne. Audrey just smiled and bellowed “HOW’S THIS FOR INSPIRATION RILES.” “Great! I think I can work with this.” “ALRIGHT THEN, I’M GONNA TAKE A NAP.” As Riley’s titanic sister eased into her slumber she began to put her feet up on the cliffside with her elephant sized toes on either side of her. “Now it’s time to get to work.” As soon as she put brush to canvas she started working like a fiend. She didn’t care that she had one sister so small that she was squashed under her foot or that she another that was so huge she could put godzilla to shame. Nothing else mattered in this trance but her art.

When she finished she put down her brush and observed her work. She was really proud of it and would be sure to thank her sister for being her muse. “Would you look at that the sky’s gone black. Better wake up Audrey.” This was easier said than done for two reasons. First of all, her sister had probably become too big to be noticed by her and second of all if she did wake up she ran the risk of accidentally being eaten by those mammoth toes of hers. Eventually she decided to tickle her with a tree branch and hope for the best. “YAAAAAAWN IS IT NIGHT TIME ALREADY? I’D BETTER GET UP” Audrey pulled her feet away from Riley but then she did something even more terrifying. She stood up. It felt like the earth was going to split in two. Riley gathered her senses and gazed upward in complete awe of her sister. It was like witnessing a goddess appear from the heavens. She stretched her arms as she woke up and began to start cracking her neck and popping her knuckles. Each time she did it sounded like the boom of a thunderstorm. She couldn’t even see her sister’s face. Her boobs seemed to be the size of planets. She was glad that it wasn’t daylight or else someone might see Audrey and think that it’s the end of days. The majesty of all this wore off once she burped. “UUUUUUURRP. SORRY ABOUT THAT. OOPS ALMOST FORGOT.” Audrey began her descent stopping at just above sixty feet. “I think that was just the power nap I needed. Riley?” Audrey reached for her sister with right hand as she began to clear her head “I think my eardrum just bursted.” “Oh quit being such a baby. You know you could’ve enlarged yourself and joined me in the lake. I’m not the bed hog I make myself out to be.” Riley rubbed her head and replied “While I appreciate the offer I was too busy working on my painting.” Audrey smiled in surprise and excitement. “Oh right I forgot about that! Let me see the result.” Using her left hand she grabbed the canvas and held it up to her face like a photo. She could see that Riley had painted her skin green and given her crown of trees. “Ooh I like this one. It’s really good.” “Thanks. I’m going through a bit of a post-impressionist phase right now and I decide to experiment.” Audrey also mentioned how she liked the depiction of how she used the mountains like armrests as well as her accurately huge bust. “I think this one is one of your best Riles. And I’m not just saying that because I’m in it.” Riley smiled and said “Thanks again. I’m thinking of calling it ‘sister nature’. Do you like the title?” “I love it. Well, we'd better head home. Wouldn't want any hikers to find us.”

As they began the trek back home Riley started thinking to herself. She liked traveling like this. Lying down in Audrey's open hand. It was much better than being trapped between her heaving breasts or shoved into a smelly sock. This was nice she could actually enjoy her surroundings. Why couldn't it always be this way? The hand slowly made its descent toward the cabin’s entrance. “You should be going to bed soon. I'm gonna finish washing the dishes and then watch a little tv.” Riley craned her neck upwards to see Audrey leaning over with her hands on her knees “Alright then. I had a lot of fun today.” Audrey's anklet started to glow as she shrank herself back down. “Me too. Oh wait, Crap. I didn't make you any dinner. I'm sorry.” “It's fine. I packed a whole meal and ate it in case you forgot.” “Are you sure you're okay? I can share some of my instant noodles.” “I'm fine really. Goodnight sis.” The two of them leaned into each other for a hug. “Goodnight sis.” Riley lazily threw her clothes on the ground and kicked off her sandals before plopping down on her bed. She was tired. So tired in fact, that she completely forgot about her little passenger. “Good god that took forever. And you're feet don't stink any less than Audrey's you big oaf!”

Now that Penny has gotten free does she take revenge and steal Riley’s crystal or has she learned her lesson?
141221112212211121.title: Sister Nature

choices: "Do you want to join me at this height?"
"Wanna tag along on my shoulder?"
"How about the three of us relax as giants today?"
1412211122122111211.content:
Penny, both beaten and battered, slowly made her way over to her sister's face. Today had been exhausting, considering the beatdown she received from her sister's throughout the course of the day. She stunk of feet and sweat, a combinations she was getting to know all too well.

Groaning, Penny tried to stand up, only to stumble back on the ground. Luckily, everything seemed to be at ease. Riley was most likely asleep. After a few minutes, the deeper breathing in the distance only confirmed it. She sighed, resigning herself for the night. She was just too tired and sore to do anything.

The tiny teenager slowly made her way over to her sister's head. She figured that sleeping on the pillow would be the best place to knock out. The last thing Penny wanted was to be trapped under her sister if she rolled over. Slowly, she made her way over, taking breaks to rest her sore body. Climbing the half inch wall the pillow made was probably the hardest part as her joints and muscles screamed out at her. Still, she persisted, trekking all the way until she reached Riley's sleeping face.

A fog of stale, humid air washed over Penny. She gagged in response while also finding the intimate view of her sister's maw unsettling.

"Of course she didn't brush her teeth," Penny grumbled, sitting down. "Being lazy isn't an excuse to be gross!"

That comment didn't get response. Then Penny marched off a few relative feet away from Riley's face.

Exhausted, Penny lay on her back, staring up at the drab ceiling. As much as she wanted to steal her sister's crystal, she was just too tired. Plus, she didn't want to risk the wrath of either of her sisters. She already had her punishment extended by a week. Any longer and she would most likely lose her mind. The least she could hope for was a day where either might be feeling particularly merciful. It didn't take long after for her to fall asleep.

Penny, surprisingly, woke up first. She sat up, feeling the soreness in her body. Rubbing the sleep from her eyes, she noticed her older sister's face not too far away. She stood up and made her way over to Riley's face, which mad an indent on the pillow. Sighing, the tiny girl slapped her sister's cheek, hoping to wake her up. No response.

Groaning, she hit harder. Still nothing.

Then there was a rumble far off in the distance. It started off as a small shake but quickly escalated to the point where it knocked her off her feet. She tumbled down until she landed against her sister's lips face first. Panicking, she scrambled away, kicking and flailing and eventually using Riley's bottom lip as a step to kick off from. This did earn a response however.

Another earthquake began with the epicenter being much closer. Penny quickly got away from the source as she crawled on all fours.

Riley began to rise, and Penny watched her sister with a combination of awe and fear. The older sister groggily stretched her arms and back.

"Pen?" Riley called, looking around.

"Over here!" cried Penny.

Looking around, Riley scanned the bed for her sister, finding the tiny teen on the pillow. Relieved, the older sister scooped up her sister in her palm.

"Hey, Riley, was that you who caused the earthquakes?"

Riley shook her head. "I don't think so. I felt them, too."

Upon realization, Riley shot up from the bed, closing her hand around her tiny sister. She rushed outside, only to find herself staring at the thick platforms of her sister's boots.

She craned her head up, only to find her view obstructed by Audrey's massive rack.

"Morning," Audrey chirped, placing her hands on her hips.

"What are you doing?!" Riley yelled.

"Going on a walk. I needed some air." Her answer was completely nonchalant.

"You could really scare someone!" Riley argued.

Audrey chuckled. "Oh, relax. Our powers aren't much of a secret anyway, Miss Social Media Butterfly. Besides, I'm not breaking any of our rules."

Riley gritted her teeth. Audrey was right, but Riley wasn't comfortable with admitting it.

Meanwhile, the smallest of the sisters was still in complete awe. She could barely comprehend the sheer size of her sister Audrey. To her, she might as well have been the size of a continent, maybe even a planet. Then, she immediately shuddered at the thought of being at the mercy of her sisters while she was shrunken but they were giants. It was a slippery slope to being hopelessly lost on their bodies.

"So," Audrey droned. "..."
1412211122122111211.title: A Chaotic Morning

choices: Swim in the lake
Sunbath on the mountain
14122111221221112111.content:
“Join you as a giant?” Riley’s eyebrow raised.

“Sure. Out here, you can grow all you want. And let me tell you, the view is great from here.”

Riley looked down at the sister in her palm. “What about her?”

“Nope, she’s still on probation.”

“Riley,” said sister pleaded. Too late though as she began to witness the palm around her expand to immense proportions. She stared up in awe as her sister grew to unimaginable heights. She felt her knees quiver as she was now the size of a flea to a mountain.

Riley grew a little higher than her sister in order to accommodate their usual sizes. Audrey grinned up at her then looked down at her palm.

“Let’s get a look at you baby sister.”

Penny gasped as both sisters leaned down over Riley’s palm. Their eyes blotted out the sun and everything else. Their pupils were now great lakes she could swim and get lost in. Their breaths sounded like storms.

“I can’t see her,” Riley complained.

“Nor can I,” Audrey agreed.

Wouldn’t it be easier to grow her back to normal size?”

“She is at normal size,” Audrey snickered. “This is how she’s meant to be as our “little” sister.”

As scared as she was, Penny needed to be seen or she was truly doomed. She tried jumping up and down calling out her sister’s names. When that didn’t she tried running towards Riley’s wrist. Audrey noticed this and leaned in closer to make out her speck of a sister.

“There you are! Hello little one!” Audrey’s voice thundered in her ears. “You’ve been so good these last few days. How would you like to spend a little more time with your big sisters?”

Penny had her hands over her ears for much of that. It was too much to handle at this size. She steadily tried to rise to her feet only to find herself staring into Riley’s ear.

“Climb in Pen. You’ll be safest here.”

“You could just make me bigger you know,” Penny screamed. Yet Riley still couldn’t hear this close, and simply tilted her hand sending her sprawling into her lobe.

“What the fuck, Riley?”

“I can make her out. Just barely,” Riley said.

“Good. Let’s get going. I want to have one helluva day.”

On they walked, through trees and over mountains. They chatted a little about their personal lives but otherwise walked on. They would make an amazing sight for any hikers.

Penny meanwhile hung onto Riley’s ear hair to keep from falling out. Outside, she got an amazing view of the landscape she had walked through numerous times both as a regular sized girl and a giant.

The sisters walked on like this for about 30 minutes. In that time, the two 300 foot women had covered an immense amount of ground. Penny then felt Riley stop.

“Why are we stopping,” she called out to Riley. Riley, barely able to make out the voice repeated the question to Audrey.

The eldest sister gestured to the mountain range and the lake in front of them.

“It’s perfect isn’t it? A cool refreshing swim in the lake or a nice long sunbathe? Either way, I don’t see much need for these.” Penny leaned out of the ear to see what was happening and upon seeing Audrey standing at 300 feet totally nude actually let go and fell down to her other sister’s shoulder.

Riley blushed as her sister stood in front of her totally bare looking at her expectantly. “Oh come on. It’s nothing I haven’t seen before.”

Riley paused for a minute then shrugged and lifted her clothes over her head.

Unfortunately for Penny who was still recovering from her fall onto the shoulder, she was caught off guard as the shirt came off. She tumbled down a canyon of flesh in near total darkness. Then the shirt came totally off and Penny could see Audrey’s mountainous breasts in front of her.

Flushing red, Penny realized in horror that in all the confusion, she had tumbled down Riley’s chest and was now sitting on top of her breast.

Far above her, Audrey grinned. “That’s more like it. Now, which will it be?”
14122111221221112111.title: "Do you want to join me at this height?"

Back of Audrey's throat
141221112212211121111.content:
Penny screamed as the massive breast she held onto descended into the vast lake. This scream was silenced as the breast submerged with her below the surface.

Riley let out a sigh as the water lapped over her skin. She closed her eyes for a minute then opened them to see her sister grinning at her.

"Isn't it great to be us? I mean, can you think of any other family with this gift? Who else can grow larger than the empire state building? Who else can reduce a thief to the size of a mouse? Who else?"

Riley smiled back.

"Yeah. I guess we are pretty lucky."

Penny would not agree with that at the moment. Swimming for her life underwater at near microscopic size, trying to get the attention of the goddesses surrounding her.

Suddenly, the whole world went topsy turvy as Riley began lowering herself further underwater. The sudden movement sent Penny going in circles.

When she righted herself, Penny gasped as she was face to face with her sister's massive eye. She stared enthralled as Riley suddenly came swimming towards her, her mouth wide open.

Penny screamed again and tried to swim away. Of course, this was to no avail. She was far too small to make any distance and she was pulled in along with the water.

She lost track of everything in the darkness, being tossed to and fro. She prayed not to be swallowed. For once her prayers were answered as she was spit out into the sun.

She tried to catch her breath but to no avail. A great mass rose out of the ocean-sized lake behind her. The water pouring off drowned her under and sent her spinning again.

Under the surface, she could make out Riley standing naked all 300 feet of her out of the lake. Seeing all of this from way down there was something else.

She caught sight of the bush between her sister's legs and looked away blushing. That's when she finally stopped spinning about and could make out the other planetoid that was her eldest sister Audrey swimming about. Of course with the size disparity between them, she could not make out all of her. As the distance closed, she got sent spinning once again. She couldn't make out where she was headed. She shut her eyes,

Still alive she opened her eyes to see where she had ended up

choices: Riley's right and all three sisters carry on with their day
Penny's right and she gets to have Riley to herself
14122111221221112113.content:
“If it’ll be even half as fun as watching you yesterday then totally!” Riley exclaimed. “What happened yesterday?” Penny asked, desperate to not be left out. “Oh right, I painted a portrait of Audrey but she grew so big that she filled up the entire lake! I wish you could’ve seen it but you were serving out your punishment in my sandal. Sorry about that.” “It’s fine but if we’re going to grow then don’t I need my crystal?” Riley put a free hand over her mouth in embarrassment. “Oh shoot. You’re right.” “What did the pipsqueak say?” Audrey said, now bending her knees to get a closer look at her little sisters. “Penny says she doesn’t have her crystal!” “Whoops, almost forgot about that.” Audrey reached into the back pocket of her shorts and pulled out a bracelet the size of a hula hoop with a green crystal on it and put it in front of riley. “Here you go.” Riley lowered her palm to the ground and let her sister off. As Penny walked toward her crystal it began to glow. The bracelet shrank to the size of a grain of rice. Penny put it on and the crystal started glowing again. Her height increased significantly until she was just above sixty feet; about eye-level with Audrey’s chest. “Ah, much better. Hey Riles, you better get on up here before I do something you’ll regret.” Riley could see that her sister was still wearing the same capri pants and Daft Punk T-shirt as when she got shrunk which was about two days ago. All that time spent underfoot without a shower meant that she had a very limited window before she passed out from the stench. Riley hadn’t noticed that Penny didn’t have any shoes on when she was shrunken. “Hey little sis are you deaf or do you actually like Penny barefoot?” Audrey asked. Riley could see ten huge toes wiggling in anticipation in front of her. Penny had practically been given the go ahead to squash her but she wasn’t going to give her the satisfaction. “I’m coming just be patient!” Riley replied. She grabbed her necklace and concentrated on bringing herself upwards. Penny saw the flash of blue light and said “Oh no you don’t.” Penny raises her foot high into the air and then promptly stomps out her sister. “Penny! What the hell!” Riley said, angry that she had been blocked. “Yeah Penny, what was that for?” “She was taking too long. Plus I had to spend extra time under her foot this is only fair.” Audrey turns to look at Riley whose head is between two toes and says “Your sister kinda has a point Riles.” Riley tried lifting the flesh from off of her body to no avail. “But she stomped on me! Does that seriously merit reward?!” Audrey takes a step back and says. “Another point for team Riley. The score is tied up. Since I am clearly the referee here I alone will decide who is right.”

Which will it be?

choices: "We're going to the lake again."

"It's a secret." (Reader's Choice)
141221112212211121131.content:
Audrey looked over at Penny, who had a smirk on her face. The she stared down at her normal sized sister, who was still struggling against the bottom of Penny's foot. As much as Audrey liked to watch her sister squirm, she had a very specific plan for today.

"I'm gonna have to go with Riley," the oldest sister said. "Sorry Pen, maybe another time."

Penny groaned, putting more pressure onto her older sister before releasing her.

In turn, Riley grimaced and wiped off the grime on her clothes before shooting up in size to join her sisters. For some reason, she liked to keep her natural height ratios when compared to her sisters. It just felt right, so Riley grew until she was about half a head taller than Audrey at around one hundred and ten feet. A tight little smile pulled at her lips as she admired the view from her height.

There was just something amazing about being over a hundred feet tall. Riley couldn't really figure out the reason. Maybe it was the awe inspiring feeling of power that came from towering over everything. Shed be lying if she said she hadn't thought of stomping around and exerting her power over everything. Audrey's invitation to grow pretty much gave her an excuse to fool around at her new height.

Audrey smiled as she looked at her sisters. She always felt perfectly at ease as a giant. If she could, she'd live as a giant on a private island or in a small town in the Pacific Northwest, anywhere where she could grow without any opposition from the population around her. However, she very much liked living in the city as well.

Penny felt her bare feet dig into the ground below. Scrunching her toes, Penny listened to the tree trunks crunch beneath her digits. If anything, she never expected to be this size. She assumed that she would be spending the day beneath Audrey's feet, or even packed between her breasts. This was much better. All she hoped was that it would last.

"So," Riley hummed. "Why are we doing this?"

"Well," Audrey said, walking away and making a path of flattened trees. "..."
141221112212211121131.title: The Big Sisters Act

Penny runs into some people. (Reserved)
1412211122122111211311.content:
The three sisters made the quick walk to the beach. Like the day before, the secluded lake looked entirely empty.

"I'm gonna swim for a bit," The oldest sister said. She pulled off her sundress, tossing it aside. The enormous article of clothing billowed in the wind. It landed on the forest, covering an entire clearing they'd passed on the there. Audrey waded into the water, leaving her sisters on the side-walk like strip of sand.

Riley pulled her art supplies from the pocket of her shorts. She set everything on the beach before shrinking down to her normal 5'9. She hummed absently as she set up her easel. "Pen, I'm just gonna stay here and paint!" She called up to her towering sibling.

"Alright, cool. I guess I'll just go for a walk." Penny said. A trip to the mountains and back seemed good. Just to make the trip quicker, she grew to around 300 feet. She began her stroll.

choices: Rebecca wakes up and adventures beyond the couch
Penny plays with Kyle before going to bed
1412211122122111211312.content:
“Plus, my favorite band is playing there.” “Sea Green Tide is playing here?” Riley said with excitement. “Yep. And since we’ll be taller than everyone there we’ll have the best seats in the house.” The sister's loved Sea Green Tide. They were an all-girl alternative rock band that rarely came to this side of the country and now they were going to be playing at an outdoor festival. “Won't everyone be scared?” Penny asked. “I'm sure it'll be fine. We’re getting there before anybody else so as long as we sit down and don't move too much people should be cool with it.” Audrey was right nobody was there yet, not even the staff. Just them and the stage. “Oh hey look! It's those giant sister's again! Glad you could make it.” After that it was a breeze. People were dancing so hard that they hardly noticed the sisters. And when they did they were treated to a ride in their hands or placed on their shoulders and knees for a better view. “Hey sis?” Penny said to Audrey. “What's up?” “When do you think that the band is gonna come?” “It should be any minute now pen. Don't tell me you’re getting bored.” “It's just that my bare feet are so smelly that I'm not getting any visitors.” “Well then if that's the case then I'll just let you have one of mine.” Audrey grabbed a boy from her left shoulder and asked him “Hey, my little sister’s feeling lonely. Do you think you could give her some company?” The boy excitedly replied “Sure thing! Anything for the three sisters.” Audrey set him down on Penny’s right knee and told him. “If you're up to it be sure to give her a foot rub too.” “Right away miss!” Penny looked down at her lap noticing the tiny boy getting to work on her soles. He actually appeared to be enjoying it. “Thanks sis. You didn’t have to do that.” “You’re welcome. Just promise me you treat him better than the last one.” “I promise.” Audrey looked over her sister’s shoulder to look at Riley, who was holding a girl in her palm.

“Say Penny, your sister’s looking pretty busy over there.” “I know. She’s started talking to this girl and hasn’t stopped for literally forever.” Audrey called to her sister “Hey Riles, you having fun over there?” Riley giggled a bit and then looked back in surprise. “Oh sorry. This is patricia. She’s a fan of the band. Wanna say hi to my two sisters Patricia?” Patricia waved her arm wildly. The sisters waved back and moved in to get a closer look at her. She was wearing jean shorts and a white transparent blouse. She also had a purple streak in her brown hair. “Wow, it’s so great to finally meet all three of you! It’s as great as I expected.” Audrey said “Why thank you. You don’t look too bad yourself. I think you better sit yourself down the show’s about to start.” “Ok.
