choices: She grabs her
She forfeits
153312.content:
Julie walked into the bathroom and sat on the closed toilet seat looking around for a place to hide Lucy. She leaned over toward the the bathroom counter which gave Penny a better view of Julie extending her arm over toward the drinking cup and dropping her cousin Lucy in it. Julie leaned back and said to Penny

“Now as for you I think I’m going to leave you in there. My fiance always likes it when I play dirty.”

She gives her breasts a hearty squeeze and started walking. Shortly thereafter Penny was struggling to stay in place. The tiny girl was used to being between boobs at least one or two cup sizes larger and this was insufficient. Penny tried grasping onto the skin of the cleavage but it was already too late, she had started tumbling down the shirt. When she landed she was looking up at Julie, who was walking back to Christine to say that she was done. Penny’s vision cleared up a bit and looked behind her to see a giant woman walking down the stairs.

“Alright honey they’re all yours!” Crap, she needed to find a hiding place quick or she was going to get spotted.

She got up and started running down the hallway as fast as she could. She heard booming footsteps from behind her. Penny was running at full speed down the hallway which was getting any shorter by the looks of it. She knew that she shouldn’t stop to turn around both because she couldn’t afford to take any breaks right now but also because she knew how much it would terrify her to see her aunt coming right for her. Despite her best efforts the booming footsteps only enticed her. She looked over her shoulder and was in awe. Christine slowly but surely revealed more of herself as she came up the steps. First her face, then her pendulous breasts, her belly, those wide swaying hips, her toned legs, and finally with a few more steps she brought her bare feet over onto the hardwood floor.

Ok Penny no more distractions, it’s go time. Penny started bolting again and headed toward the nearest doorway. Nearest being more like a mile in length. The sound of her aunt’s feet slapping against the floor only increased in volume but Penny knew better this time than to look back. More running. It actually felt like she was getting further away somehow, yet the booming was growing louder. At this point it just became too unbearable for penny and she took another look behind only to find a titanic sole above her. With a splat Penny was stuck to the skin of a giant foot. After a few stomps she had guessed that Christine hadn’t noticed her yet and continued with her hunt. After a while Penny just wanted to get noticed already but was having difficulty as her limbs felt like gum. Eventually she walked into the bathroom (Penny could tell because the floor felt really dirty) and sat on the toilet lid. Christine lifted her right foot with Penny on it and crossed legs with the ankle of her right foot resting on her left knee.

“Now where are they?” Christine wondered aloud. Right here you moron, was what Penny wanted to say after she was tired of her family using her as an insole but on second thought she didn’t want to know what happened if she was caught.

“Well what do we have here?” So much for that. Christine took two fingers and plucked Penny from her sole.

“Gotta hand it to you girl, hiding that long right under my nose is impressive.”

“Please just let me go.”

“Ok sweetie, just hang on tight” And with that Penny was dropped yet again into a family member’s cleavage.

“Well this is just great.” Penny said sandwiched between two fleshy planets. At least this time there was no chance of her getting loose. Audrey watched as her aunt sauntered down the stairs, her hips swayed and her breasts bounced.

“Well, who did you find honey?” Christine reached into her bosom and pulled out a tiny Penny. Julia was flabbergasted.

“You’ll never guess where I found her.”

“Where?” Julia said trying to figure out how she lost her in the first place.

“She was stuck on my sole! I didn’t realize she was there until I had sat down. Who knows how long she was under there.”

“Let me go fetch Lucy, she’s probably wondering what’s taking so long.” Christine set Penny by her sisters on the counter and leaned in close to tell them

“This is the final part. The ending’s almost here.” Audrey didn’t like the smile that her aunt was flashing, both because it was frighteningly large and also because she could tell that the win condition would be at the expense of the losers.

“Here she is. I hid her in the drinking cup.”

“You weren’t planning on having me swallow her were you?”

“What? No, but we can discuss that later.”

Christine turned to the four shrinkees and said “Alright here’s the deal. In the last two rounds Riley and Lucy weren’t discovered so Audrey and Penny are the losers. However, there can be only one winner so for the last round I’m going to take Riley and Lucy and put them in a thick carpet. They will have 30 seconds to hide themselves in the bristles before Julia and I have to find them. Whomever isn’t found will be declared the winner.”

For Riley those 30 seconds were pure panic. She didn’t want to be found but she also didn’t want to be squished underneath Christine or Julie’s feet. She saw how dirty and bruised Penny had gotten and she didn’t want that to happen, even if it was an accident.

“Ready or not here we come!” The two women sang in unison. The girls were so small that the giantesses were on their hands and knees combing through the carpet. Eventually they gave up and started sliding their feet against the carpet to scoop the girls with their toes or stomp in an effort to stick them to their soles. There were couple close calls. One time Julia stomped onto the ground and it almost got Riley. She could see a big toe on her left and the second toe on her right. They were each about as tall as her and if she had been an inch or so away from where she was she would’ve been paste. The foot slowly lifted itself into the air for inspection.

“Damn, still nothing.” Julie slammed her foot against the carpet and repeated the process.

After five minutes of this Christine pouted and said “Oh my god this is taking forever!” She decided to plop down on the carpet while unbeknownst to her Riley was desperately trying to escape the impending buttcheeks of doom. Riley had looked up to see her gigantic aunt falling backward like a tower in stark white leggings. She tried as hard as she could to run away but the two moons in her sky only got closer. They had cast their shadow over where she stood and she knew that it was too late.

“Oh cheer up honey, we’ll find one of them soon I can feel it.” Julia reached her hand out to her fiance who was sat on the carpet with her legs outstretched.

“If you say so Jules.” She grabs her partner’s hand is lifted upward, bringing her niece with her. Christine closes her eyes and leans in close to Julie so that they can kiss. She kisses her back as Christine holds the back of her head with her right hand. Julia reaches down for Christine’s backside but her wrist is topped by Christine’s other hand.

“Sorry sugarbear, now’s not exactly the right time. We have guests over on the counter watching us.”

Julia released and said “Sorry, I guess I got carried away.”

“I’ll help carry you away once this wedding’s finally over.”

Julia smiled and replied “Can’t wait for it my love. Now back finding our other guests.”

The two of them searched for a minute or so when Julia looked over at Christina bending over and had two thoughts. First, damn am I lucky to come home to that deliciousness. Second, what’s that on her right buttcheek? After a second she realized it must’ve been her tiny niece-in-law.

Does she swipe her and win the game or forfeit and let Christine discover her for herself?
153312.title: She falls out

choices: One of the engaged women
Lucy
1533121.content:
Julia slowly walks over and pinches the tiny woman off of her would-be-wife’s buttock.

She snaps back and says “Ow! What was that for?”

“For being a clueless klutz yet again.” Christine squinted her eyes at what was pressed between her two fingers.

“Is that what I think it is?”

“Yep, you caught another one without even noticing yet again. Your rear is much larger and wider than your feet, big as they may be, and trapped poor Riley here.”

“Perfect, so I win then.”

“No I win. I got her first.”

“No I got her first.”

“Your ass got her first.”

“My ass is me so I got her first.”

“You didn’t even notice she was there I’m taking her if you give it up.”

“If you do that then I’ll just shrink you down and sit my big fat ass on you too.”

“You wouldn’t do that bluffer.”

“You're right, you win.”

Julia sets Riley on the counter and asks “Now where’s Lucy?”

“I don’t know. We both checked our soles right?”

“Yeah we did.”

“Lucy! Sweetie! Your aunty wants you to come out of hiding. I promise I won’t hurt you. In fact, you’re about to get a nice little treat.” After this Lucy stepped out from the carpet forest into the open.

“There you are my baby.” She grabs Lucy and puts her with the rest of the girls. Julia and Christine look at them with both of them having one of their arms around the other’s hip.

“Okay now for the end result. The point of this game was to decide who should be taking care of who for the day. Not quite as a toy but more or less. Since my partner found Audrey first that’s who she’ll be with. I found Penny so I’ll be in charge of her. And since Lucy did such a great job of hiding she’ll be responsible for the remaining Riley. Come here a second Lucy.”

Christine stretches out her fingers for Lucy to step up. She set her on the ground and with a purple flash returns her back to normal size. Lucy begins to eye Riley with a mischievous look, causing Riley to gulp.

“Ok then girls, off you go.”

Who do you follow?
1533121.title: Last round over

choices: Lucy has something fun for the both of them in mind.
Lucy has something fun for herself in mind.
15331212.content:
Lucy sat on the couch, pinching her tiny cousin between her fingers. She never really got a chance to play with tiny people. Her own powers were severely limited by her mother Renee. She did circumvent her mother's restrictions but only with close friends with nothing too extreme being done. However, she had frequently texted with her cousin Penny about the trio of sister's weird games.

This was probably the closest she was going to get to be a part of their games.

Lucy kicked her feet up on the coffee table and watched as her aunt Christine and Julia walk away, each carrying their respective prize.

"Hey, cousin," Lucy called, dangling Riley between the tips of her fingers. "Sorry it had to come between us. I would have loved to get my hands on Penny. You'll do, though."

Riley wasn't sure whether to be terrified or angry. She lost in a fairly rigged competition, and she could hardly do nothing about it after being plastered beneath her aunt Christine's ass. She also had no idea what to expect from Lucy since she hadn't really been shrunken around her.

"It's gonna be chaotic the next few days," Lucy mused, placing her cousin on her palm. "A whole house and a party with our 'unique' family. Things are going to get messed up real quick."

Riley chuckled, realizing that things may turn out well for her.
15331212.title: To the Victor...

info.brief_description: Three size changing sisters have a very odd relationship.
info.description:
Ecological scientists Donovan and Marie Lancaster are called to a research expedition in the Arctic Circle, leaving their three daughters alone for the summer. Any normal set of parents would be worried, but the Lancasters are especially concerned given that their children have the power to shrink and grow things at will thanks to the power of a magic crystal

The sisters, at the order of their parents, have vowed to not to use their powers on outsiders. However, they’ve made a separate deal with each other: anything goes between the three of them. This of course leads the sisters to try to have as much fun as possible at the expense of their siblings.

A quick rundown of their powers: They can all shrink and grow things and other people at will. However, if one of them is shrunk by someone else, they cannot grow themselves back. Although, a magic crystal keeps them immune from the other sisters' powers.

Characters:

Audrey: At 24 Years old, she’s the eldest of the Lancaster sisters. She’s currently a student teacher at her old high school. Now that it’s Summer, she’s babysitting her younger sisters. Since her parents are away, Audrey expects her siblings to do as she says or else they will be a quarter of an inch tall at the business end of her foot. She never abuses her powers on her sisters unless they actively disobey her though she's known to go way overboard in the name of justice.
Physical characteristics: Light brown hair, green eyes, and a short, thick/stocky figure compared to her sisters. Her magic crystal is pink and attached to an anklet.

Riley: 19 year old college student back home for Summer break. As an artist and freelance photographer, she’s the most likely to think outside the box when dealing with her tiny siblings. She documents her life and creative use of her powers on the internet for her absurdly large follower base, much to the annoyance of her sisters. Generally a pacifist but can have a blind spot to her sisters' well-being when she's feeling "inspired."
Physical characteristics: Red hair, gray eyes, freckles, and a tall, thin figure. Her magic crystal is blue and attached to a necklace.

Penelope (Penny): 18 year old senior currently in her teenage rage phase, often taking her frustrations out on her schoolmates. Generally a misanthrope and not above shrinking those who royally piss her off. This mostly comes from the fact that she's often helpless and at the mercy of her sisters. She also has a secret, almost crippling fear of heights that she refuses to tell her sisters about because she’s afraid they’ll use it against her.
Physical characteristics: Dyed black hair, green eyes, and a short thin figure. Her magic crystal is green and attached to a bracelet.

Feel free to introduce new characters. Options include: family members, close friends, boyfriends/girlfriends, or even strangers (at the risk of breaking their cardinal rule and being punished).

Locations:

The Lancaster House: Shrinking only. The house where all three sisters were raised but is now only occupied by Penny and her parents. A rather spacious home with enough room for the three to live at normal size. Each of the girls' rooms are personalized sanctums for the owner and torture chambers for their sisters.

Audrey's Apartment: Shrinking only. An incredibly tiny one room, one bathroom apartment. Enough space for Audrey and Audrey alone, but she insists on shrinking her siblings to make room.

The Summer Cabin: Both shrinking and growth. An isolated cabin in the middle of the mountains and the only place where the girls feel like themselves given that it's the few places they're allowed to grow. The three often love to sleep on the mountain ranges, use the lake as a bathtub, and just toy with the locals who've known the sisters since they were children.

Feel free to introduce new locations.


Rules:

1. A basic understanding of grammar please. You don’t have to be Hemingway, but at least make your additions readable.
2. No incest. (Exceptions can be made for unaware. Email me first for approval.)
3. Anyone who changes size cannot die. The shrinking and growth prevents death but not injury.
4. The minimum size is 1/16th of an inch, and the maximum size is 500 feet (Though this is more of a loose guideline).
5. Growth is allowed in certain locations (basically away from large populations).
6. If you want to introduce a new character with powers, email me first.*
7. One sentence choice chapters will be deleted if not added to in the next three days.
8. Feel free to email me on any questions, requests, comments etc.
10. Go crazy and get creative.

*Edited on 4/14/17
